1.content:
"Does my tie stand straight, dear? I have to look good in case I run into any reporters!" Stephen Salt, patriarch of Salt house announced to the other 3 members of his family.

"Dad is going on another research trip and he's leaving us at home. Typical." Summer, the older daughter, said this without even looking up from her newspaper. (Some might question the truthfulness of a school girl reading the newspaper over her breakfast, but that just goes to show that Summer Salt was not your average schoolgirl.)

"Oh, dear, I already told you. You girls are still a bit too young to travel with me and your mother. Besides, adventuring is no reason for you to miss several days of school."

"But...But what if something happens HERE while you are gone?" Mouse, the younger daughter asked while desperately pulling on her dad's sleeve. "Maybe- Maybe Mrs. Hobbs gets kidnapped" (Mrs. Hobbs was their next-door neighbor and one who Mouse particularly hated, ever since the old woman caught her chasing after her cats) "or we and mom get attacked by burglars...Well, it COULD happen."

Mr. Salt gave his wife a hearty laugh and a big, broad smile.
"Ah, the girls have such imaginations, don't you think, dear? Now, girls, what is it that your dad always says?...Adventure..."

"...only happens in fiction..." the girls replied obediently in chorus. "You might want to think a bit more about that one, dad." Summer added.

"Now, now, no more backtalk. Obey your mother while I'm not at home, and Summer, look after your sister while your mother is out visiting her friends and shopping, alright?"

The two parents were still waving and laughing while they crossed the house treshold and waited for the taxi.

"Rather than us, THEY are the ones who act like something out of fiction" Summer muttered.

"So, what are we going to do now, Summer?" Mouse* asked excitedly.

(*Mouse's parents haven't christened their youngest daughter Mouse. Her old name, which she now refused to wear, even though it was affectionately hand-picked by her mother, was Susan. However after a complicated childhood incident gained her the nickname "Mouse", she took to the new title like a fish takes to water. She used it when she introduced herself and she even put it on all of her school supplies and clothing, after carefully scrubbing off the original text first, of course. Her parents tried to resist her, but eventually gave in, and from that point onward, nobody be they friend or stranger was allowed to address her by any other name.)

Summer knew that look on her sister's face.
Their parents have barely stepped outside, and she was already thinking of trying out something against the house rules.

Summer glanced outside the window. The milkman was finishing up his rounds, some early birds were gathering on the roadside. Business seemed as usual in the sleepy town of Hollering Heights. And yet, something felt off.
Her sixth sense was telling her that this wasn't going to be just like any other day.

She decided to...
1.title: It all began on an ordinary morning...

11.content: But where should they search first?
11.title: Explore the house with Mouse

choices: The town fair. Plenty of strange things going on there.
The school. It's the best time now when lessons are out.
The neighborhood. They already know us and will trust us with a job.
111.content:
"Whoever gets to Summer's room first gets to read her diary!" Mouse yelled and dashed ahead.
"Hey! Stop that! I did not give you permission you to enter my room!" Summer shouted and chased after her.

Seeing that her sister was catching up, Mouse dived behind the couch and the two of them chased each other around it for a while.
Finally, Mouse broke out again and took off running but before she could reach the door, her sister jumped her.
Mouse got grabbed from behind and two hands started squeezing her sides.
Mouse curled up into a ball but her sister did not show mercy until she became a giggling mess.
When Summer stood up at last, Mouse looked up at her teary-eyed but happy.

Summer hesitated as if a thought had just occurred to her.

"Mouse, can you keep a secret?"

"I'm not sure if I could, if someone was tickling my toes like you did just now" Mouse giggled, and wiggled her toes at her.

Summer sighed.
"Can you PROMISE not to let it slip by accident, at least? At least to Mom and Dad?"

Mouse hesitated, but curiosity won out.

"OK." She nodded. "What is it?"

Her sister led her into her room (pretty nondescript, Mouse thought) where the older girl threw open her drawers and the doors on her closet.

They revealed various objects: a magnifying glass, some old binoculars, plastic gloves and a notebook.
She covered the inside of her closet in newspaper cut-outs.
Mouse pursed her lips and seemed disappointed; she'd been expecting something better.

She gave the cut-outs an appraising look.
"Masked Tickler Returns: Fiction or Fact?"
"The Lost Gold of Cacklemore Creek"
"Police Chief Declares Featherton Ghost A Hoax"
Mouse suppressed a yawn.
"What are you collecting all this stuff for?" she asked sourly.

Summer turned around and pressed her fists on her waist.
"I'm going to be a detective." she announced.

She looked so genuinely hurt when her sister laughed that Mouse soon stopped.
Instead she chose to continue to size her up with that innocent smile that Mean Old Man Harris Dublin from next street once described as her "shit-eating grin".

"Fine" Summer said. "I did not expect you to understand anyway."
Naturally, this made her sister suddenly become interested again.

"Sherlock Holmes, Auguste Dupin, Nancy Drew...I've been studying up on their methods all summer.
Now I'm as good an investigator as any of them.
If this neighborhood hides any secrets, I plan to crack them open."

"Do you want it?
I'll take you on as assistant. Just this one time, at least."

Mouse hesitated.
"Dad told us not to leave the house" she said while she picked at the carpet with her toes.

"It's OK. I've had it all planned out. We'll leave a message on the door to tell them where we had gone if they come back sooner."

Mouse scratched her head. She knew her sister was weird. But it sounded better than being stuck in the house all summer.

"Okay" she relented. "I'm in. But where do you want to start?"
111.title: Summer's room

1111.content:
The Funland Fair hasn't been in town for long but secretly both sisters wanted to go.
Hollering Heights had a normal agricultural show every year, but it was the first time that it also had a circus, with real trapeze artists, clowns and wild animals.

Their father promised he'd take them after the holidays (once her busy schedule allowed), but they feared that the circus will already had left by then.

The sisters realized this would be the perfect opportunity to make a visit.

It meant they had to walk quite a long way on foot, but they'd still make it back before sundown.
They quickly locked up the house and headed for the fair...

What do you think they should visit first?
1111.title: The town fair.

11113.content:
After the entrance there were some other intriguing attractions...

Should they check out:
11113.title: The fair, no. 2

choices: Should they try to sneak in?
Or should they proceed to the main entrance?
111133.content:
Naturally, it was the circus that both wanted to visit the most.

To their surprise the giant tent looked abandoned. There were no signs or posters outside to indicate that a programme would be on today.

As they walk past the tent, Mouse notices a tear in the wall, large enough for a child to fit through.
111133.title: The fair, no. 3

1111332.content:
Summer heads to the open flap at the front of the Circus tent, noticing Mouse lagging behind, she calls out "Mouse, hurry up already"

As Mouse runs up to Summer, they peek into the circus tent, there is quite a bit of circus equipment set up, and a small building towards the back but before the girls can enter, they hear someone shouting from behind "No, no, no, you mustn't enter!"

A tall gentleman in a red blazer with a black coat and tails comes running up to the two girls, puffing slightly as he tries to get his breath back.

"We are not ready for visitors yet!" announces the man

"We were just wanting to look around" replies Summer

"I am Hennig, the Ringmaster of this circus, I am sure you are wanting to see our star of the show the Clown Prince, aren't you?" The man reaches out his hand as he speaks to the girls

"I'm Summer, and this is Susan" "Mouse!" interjects the younger girl, "Yes she prefers to go by the nickname Mouse" Summer shakes the man hand, followed by Mouse "But who is the Clown Prince?" Asks Summer

"Just like the name implies, he is a Prince among Clowns, he is who all the children love to see! He says there is nothing better than the laughter of children, and during the show, he proves it!" Hennig begins a spiel promoting the shows the circus put on.

"Can't we just look a little?" Mouse breaks into the flow

"Ahh, I would love to show you around, but the Clown Prince can be a little..." Hennig pauses looking for the correct work "temperamental. He doesn't like to be disturbed" Hennig suddenly finds his own feet very interesting as he says that.

"Hmm" Summer's detective skills clearly picking up that the Ringmaster is hiding something

Hennig suddenly perks up "But I'll tell you what, the Mirror Maze is open right now, I'll even get you in free of charge!"

Summer and Mouse decide to :
- Plead their case to try to get inside the circus tent
- Go back to the hole in the tent and try to sneak inside that way
- Take the Ringmaster up on his offer and visit the Mirror Maze
1111332.title: The main entrance?

11113321.content:
"Plllleeeeaaaassssseeeee" Begs the younger Salt sister

"We won't touch anything, or disturb anyone" Explains the older girl "I promise"

Looking over the two girls the ringmaster seems to come to a decision "All right, just this once"

"Yes!" exclaim the two girls together, Summer clearly excited to enter and find out why the ringmaster was so evasive earlier and Mouse excited to see the circus before everyone else.

"I will show you around personally" Hennig tells the girls

"Oh I don't want to trouble you" Summer tells the ringmaster, wanting some time to investigate on her own.

"It's no trouble at all, I know the circus better than anyone" Hennig quickly squashes that objection.

Hennig begins to show the girls around, he tells the girls about the animals the circus uses, and shows them the high flying equipment as well as lets the girl try to lift the weights the strongman uses, neither girl can budge it even an inch. As the ringmaster begins to lead them away Summer asks "What about that building back there?"

Hennig replies "That's the building the Clown Prince gets prepared in, you don't want to go back there"

Summer makes a mental note to investigate that building as soon as possible, but before she can ask more a voice startles the group from behind

"Now who are these treasures?" asks the newcomer

When the group turns around they see:
- The Clown Prince himself
- Maxx, the Strongman
- Leaping Leanne, the trapeze artist
11113321.title: Beg the ringmaster

1112.content:
"Why'd we want to go back to school even though we're on a break?"

"Are you kidding? You can't search for secrets unless the school is empty.
There were so many times I wanted to investigate something, but they'd never let me do it between periods.
The Science Room ghost, Mrs. Roper's secret treasure stash, that rare object one of the kids lost the other day...
Come on, there's no time to lose."

"Shouldn't we invite some of the other kids?"

"What for?"

"Well, they could help us search faster. We could tell them we're doing this as a test of courage."

Summer considered this - with more people she'd certainly be able to cover more ground, but she wasn't sure if they wouldn't just get in the way.

What should Summer do?
1112.title: The school.

1113.content:
"We'll scout and protect the parts in our general area first." Summer declared. "That's what a responsible junior sleuth would do. I'm positive that there are actually several mysteries in need of solving here already that nobody notices - expect for Summer Salt, of course!"

They decided to ask...
1113.title: Neighborhood watch

choices: Fortune favors the brave (or does it?)
She should probably come up with a plan if she wishes to approach them
111311.content:
"Those two? Summer, is this really a good idea?"

Summer wondered if it was.

Margaret was the class delinquent; a cute freckled girl with braided hair whose family owned some land past the town borders and were the main organizers of the annual agricultural fair.
Marge herself however had a serious bondage and tickle interest, and would constantly ambush other kids (both in school, and after classes behind the school building) and experiment with their sensitivity. No matter how many times she was reprimanded for bullying, it seemed her single minded pursuit only grew stronger.

Her partner-in-crime, Abby, was a shorter, plump girl with pigtails. Summer sometimes wondered why she hung out with her but Margaret seemed to like her quite a bit.

Summer, who was so ticklish on her feet it was almost painful, had a lot of luck on her side to be able to avoid all of their attempts to capture her, often only escaping by a hair's breadth.
Like Mouse said, seeking those two out would be tempting fate.

On the other hand, there had been a number of times when Summer could make Margaret obey her. As class rep, she could get them into trouble with the teachers and so Summer could usually make them leave the younger kids alone if she spotted them. She even delivered notes from class to Margaret's house once when the latter was sick.
111311.title: Margaret and Abby

choices: "I have an obligation towards your parents. You know I can't do that."
"And what are YOU gonna do about it if I don't?"
1113111.content:
Summer found the doors unlocked when she arrived to Margaret's family's house. However this was not very surprising - hardly anybody in Hollering Heights usually locked their doors in the summer. Public safety was considered to be good in the small town, and every family with children tended to keep their doors open for the kids of other families when they came to visit.

Knowing this Summer entered the house without thinking too much into it. The main rooms seemed to be empty but she could hear some faint sounds from upstairs, so she followed the stairs up to the bedrooms. However, as she swung the first door open, she immediately wished she had knocked.
For she had stumbled upon a most unbelievable scenario...

Marge and Abby were both in their school uniforms, but they were unbuttoned and both girls were barefoot. Abby was sitting on a chair and Marge was tying her wrists with some sort of rope. Around them on the floor were various other equipment like cuffs, a collar, and a whip.
Both parties were so shocked that neither of them moved for 5 seconds.
It was Margaret who came round first.

"G-Get her!" she yelled in panic. Summer turned around to run, but the two girls were faster.
She tried to get free, but Margaret had a grip on her like an iron vise.

"What should we do with her, Marge?" Abby said.

"Just stop her from escaping." Margarter barked, her teeth chattering.
She quickly grabbed the long rope that's previously been used on Abby's wrists and they promptly tied Summer to the chair. Her ankles were fixed to the front legs of the chair, making her soles face upward. Her wrists were bound together and secured to the backrest. Margaret then put her palm over her mouth so that she wouldn't scream.

After a few intense seconds, Marge removed her hand.
"Look - you can't tell anyone what you saw here. Got it? If you do...I'll just...You can't imagine what I'll do to you..." she said, pacing up and down.

"B-ut WHAT did I see?" Summer blurted out. "All I saw were you two, I mean, it's not like you did anything ba..." Her voice trailed off under Margaret's gaze.

"Tsk." Her face fell. "You think my parents would accept a-an L-word? If this gets out of here I'm finished."

"But Marjie, I didn't know you were ashamed of me?" Abby asked playfully and pouted.

Margaret turned away from Summer and grabbed the hands of her girlfriend.

"There's no way I could be ashamed of you. Because I, I really-"

Well this was all very fascinating, Summer thought, except that I was still tied up.
I'm more concerned with how I will get out of here at the moment than what's going on between these two idiots. She glanced around searching for something that could help her out and found nothing.

Meanwhile the grand emotional scene seemed to be over because Margaret came over to Summer again.

"Okay, do you SWEAR you'll never tell this to anyone? I'll remind you that you have no choice unless you want to feel my wrath."
1113111.title: Fortune favors the brave (or does it?)

choices: What else is there to do but laugh...
11131111.content:
Marge seemed relived, just from hearing that. Summer wondered just how strictly her parents were keeping her, and filed that information away for future reference.

"But what do we do with her now?"
"Well, she was kinda intruding on our free time..."
"Abby, I want her out of here too, but she may just run off to tell on us anyway, I don't trust her...It seems like we have no choice but to keep her here until the evening."
"Well, if she's going to be here, we might as well have her join in..."

Summer really didn't like the look in their eyes as they were sizing her up.

She clenched her teeth and tested the ropes on her wrists again as suspicion in her mind turned into certainty.

"Look," she said with fear in her eyes. "Why don't we just call it a day and forget this all happened..."

The girls approached her slowly and towered over her.

"...I mean, didn't you say you'd let me go if I agreed? N-no!"

"But we don't want to let you go now that you're our guest..."

"...and now we have you bound to a chair and right where we want you..."

"Please!" Summer panicked. "Look, I only came here looking for mysteries..."

"Oh, there are MANY mysteries here. Like, "Is tiny Summer as ticklish as she always acts about it?"
Or, "I wonder what will happen if we tickle both of these feet non-stop for hours."

"L-Look, the weekend is short and I have much to do..."

"You should have thought of that before you intruded on OUR weekend" Margaret grumbled. "Now you have no choice but to stick around until we're done with you."
11131111.title: "Sure, sure, whatever."

choices: Margaret joins in on Summer's Left Foot
Abby takes off Summer's shirt for some upper body tickling fun
111311111.content: Margaret and Abby grinned maliciously at Summer, Summer couldn't believe she made the decision to come here of all places, what was she thinking? Now Margaret and Abby were going to torture her all day long, and it is only noon, that means they have the whole rest of the day to make her squeal. "Abby why don't you keep our guest busy while I go and make us 3 some lunch for our long day together" Margaret snickered as she left Abby alone with the poor tied up ticklish Summer. Summer tried begging Abby to let her go, "Please let me go Abby, I promise I won't ever barge in like this again, just don't tickle me please" Abby smiled "Sorry Summer, I would like to let you go but if I did that then I would be the one Marge would tickle all day because I let you go" Summer knew she was in so much trouble, Marge and Abby always teamed up on kids at school whenever either one of them got a hold of them, and Summer knew how they tickled their victims to the brink of insanity, not letting up even an inch no matter how much their victims begged. Summer had always been able to avoid them at school but now she had no where to run and no other kids to take the fall so she could escape, she knew hell was coming her way fast and there's nothing she can do to stop it. If her sister had come with her then she might have been able to help but Mouse had decided to go over to her own friends house while Summer came here. Abby sat down in front of Summers bare soles, as she eyed them up and down for a couple seconds before beginning Summers Tickle Hell, Abby began by teasing Summer with sliding one finger up and down her right arch, Summer immediately cringed as she felt Abby's finger make contact with her arch, she tried to hold in her laughter but with Summer's feet being some of the most hypersensitive feet around she was only able to last about 5 seconds before she started cracking up. "HahahahahahNoooooStttooooopppppllleeeaasseeeeHahahahahaha" Abby then began slide all her fingers up and down Summers right arch which made Summer laugh louder. Summer already felt like she couldn't take much more and the torture had just started, how would she be able to survive a whole day of this. Then Abby grabbed Summer's toes with one hand and began spidering her fingers underneath Summer's toes which sent Summer into hysterics "HahahahahahahahaOoooMmmmyyyyyGoooooddddddpllleeeaaassseeesttoooopppphahahah ahahahaha". Meanwhile in the other room Margaret could hear Summer's laughter echo throughout the house which was music to her ears, her assistant was doing a great job so far but the worse was still yet to come for Summer because Abby's tickling is nothing compared to Margaret's so if she thinks she is in hell now, she will be in for a big surprise once Margaret gets her fingers on her. "Lunch is just about done which means I will be able to have some fun with our guest soon as well".
111311111.title: What else is there to do but laugh...

1113111111.content:
Margaret came back in, and knelt down next to Summer's chair.
Abby scooted over and let Margaret grab the other foot.

"Waah" Summer cried, and shut her eyes.

As we mentioned before, Summer's ankles were tied to the chair's legs with her knees bent in a way that her soles were both were facing up.

She could feel the two girls shuffle behind her.
Maybe it won't be so bad, it suddenly occurred her.
Then she felt something something soft that were probably Marge's fingers on her right sole and was reminded that yes, it WAS that bad.

Margaret, the little sadist, was examining her left foot like it was some kind of rare specimen in a lab. She tested her toes, like she was tuning up a piano, then she grabbed the foot and turned it this way and that way. She started giving little baby tickles on various spots, her fingers visiting the insteps, the curves of the sole, the heels. Summer was close to crying because she realized she was learning about what parts were the most sensitive and would make Summer beg and scream and cry the most. So that when she finally got serious, her attack was going to be devastating.

In the meantime, it was Abby who became the focus of Summer's loathing.
Summer now had a massive hatred for Abby. Previously she made the mistake of putting her down as just an innocent lackey to carry out Marge's whims, but now she realised that she was a girl for whom empathy was just another word in the dictionary.
As she scratched her sole, humming to herself happily, she acted like all the frantic flapping and toe-twirling wasn't even there. At least Marge responded to Summer's twitches and cries, if only to try to experiment and get a better reaction out of her, but Abby just disregarded her predicament and carried on mercilessly.

Summer knew she was sensitive. But she felt like up until this point she never fully realized what that really meant. Every minute, every SECOND unlocked new unexplored depths of despair in her. And all of this with only a couple of feathers and fingers...Summer felt like she was about to break down crying from the humiliation alone.

"Ooh, is someone coming down with the giggles?" Margie asked.

Summer shook her head and her tears were falling.

"Tickle tickle little girl" she sung.
"NOPLEASE!"

To her amazement, Margaret actually stopped at this point. She stood up and wiped her mouth.

"Don't worry." she said. "You haven't seen NOTHING yet. Abbie-girl?"
1113111111.title: Margaret joins in on Summer's left foot

11131111111.content:
Summer squirmed and begged but the girls were just giggling and pulled the blindfold over her eyes.
She sat there in total darkness, wiggling her toes a bit in fright.
There was no way she could be sweating more than she already did, but the blood thumping in her head definitely intensified.

She'd have jumped if the ropes allowed when a finger poked her ribs. Another two gave a playful squeeze to her thigh, her neck, her waist...

"Oh no! Who are you!"
"Nuuu go awayy" she begged

When she braced herself for an attack at her upper body, the playful squeeze arrived on her neck and toes.
The girls were circling around her and launched new and new surprise attacks, and Summer danced around in all directions as she was being tickled to pieces.

Then, after everything went silent for a few seconds (Summer's attention flickered around in panic, trying to predict what'd happen next), without any warming, she felt...
11131111111.title: "Blindfold her."

choices: "Aw, we broke her. Let's allow her calm down a bit, she's no fun like this."
"You know what? I don't care what happens to this bitch. Continue."
111311111111.content:
This was...What was this? This wasn't how tickling felt! Nothing could possibly tickle like that! This wasn't what I was promised! Summer felt betrayed even though she wasn't actually promised anything. The past thirty minutes had been hell and yet she would have done anything to go back to "normal" tickling now. Detective instincts out the window, she didn't even bother guessing what item was causing the extreme feelings on her feet as her mind was preoccupied with other thoughts.

As the girls redoubled their scrubbing efforts, Summer was screaming so loudly they probably even heard her in the house at the end of the street.
Summer laughed desperately as her soles were mercilessly teased.

After about five minutes into this, Summer suddenly started yelling.

"NOO!
I'LL DO ANYTHING! JUST NO MORE TICKLING! ANYTHING BUT TICKLING!"
She twitched.
"NO! MORE!"
Her face was pale with fury, and she ignored her aching sore throat as she yelled with all her might.

"Aw, but we haven't even introduced you to the REALLY fun tools yet."
"YOU COCKSUCKING..." and what followed were all sorts of profanity.
"Why, Summer. Such language! I didn't know the good student would use words like that! But, you're mistaken if you think this is going to make us stop..."
"#&@ YOU! YOU'RE GONNA MAKE ME FAINT YOU CUNT!"

When they continued to ignore her pleas, Summer broke down crying.
"No more tickling. Bo-ho-ho. Bo-ho-ho."

Margaret said...
111311111111.title: Brushes on her feet (Summer's broken)

choices: Yell at her and roll up crying
Kick her in the face and run
Bear with it and let her
1113111111111.content:
It barely registered for Summer that they removed her bonds and threw her on the bed.
It would be several minutes before she opened her eyes again. Too tired to move, she saw Abby kneeling accross her on the bed and grinning, and Margaret apparently fussing with a cooking pot in the background.

She sighed and closed her eyes, but she opened them fast when she felt something poke her ribs.
Margaret's little friend was still fussing over Summer.
Even after going so clearly overboard, she did not know when to stop and quit looking for a way to get her fill.
She did not dare to attack Summer outright again, so she was giving her gentle pokes then withdrawing before she could complain.

Summer was furious. There was no limit to the hatred she had for Abby now.

It took all of her strength to...
1113111111111.title: "Aw, we broke her. Let's allow her calm to down...

choices: Use a secret code between her and Mouse
1113111111112.content:
"You know what Abby? I don't care. Continue.
I'm fed up with this slut, always acting like she's soo much greater than us.
Let's have some REAL f-ing tickle torture."

"Please guys I can't possibly stand another hour of this!
Don't you have some sympathy?"

"If it was somebody else, I might. But Summer I hate you.
YOU, my dear, are getting the SPECIAL BRUSH."
"NOO I don't want the special brush."
(laugh) "Don't you want to know first what the special brush is?"
"I don't. I don't wanna knoow." Summer complained.

"You know Summer...even though you're just a nosy nerd with no redeeming qualities, when you're tussed up like that you look kinda erotic..." Margaret said. "I didn't think you'd be any good when we tied you up but now that your soles and sides have turned red they're kinda inviting, like they're asking for more..."

Margaret disappeared from sight and Summer was pale was fear.
"Please, guys...I realize now that I was wrong. Sorry...I'm sorry." They just laughed at this.

Summer heard a buzzing sound and something vibrating was pushed against her sole.
"What is this! What is this!" She yelled
"Bwuhaha-haa HA!"
Nohohohohoyikes!
helpmeno" (she grinned and shut her eyes and shook her head)
She scrunched her soles and much as she could as her two soles were teased simultanously.
"Ehehehehe! Plehehhehehehase! Wuaah!"
NOT! THE! BRUSHES!
Ohnoo I'm gonna die laughing."

"Oh geeze, I'm fed up with Miss Wussy Pants bitching.
"Oh please I'm ticklish, oh please you're torturing me..." Shut UP!

"I can't help it I hate it. I hate it so much. (sob, sob) I hate you."

This was ignored and Abby started raking her ten fingers over her sides while Margaret was getting busy on her feet.
She was half laughing, half crying

"It hurts! C'mon! Pleeeaaase.
Noo this is inhuman.
Ahahaha UhhahahaSCREAMsobbing
I can't breathe. Hehehaha. I can't...please.
Noo not the feet again Margaret noo... PLEASE!
Why did god give me this f-ing body. WHY."

When she felt like she was about to pass out they gave her a break. They both left the room and ate and talked in the kitchen. Summer's eyes (after she had a few minutes to compose herself) were darting around seeking some means of escape, fearing every second that'd bring her closer to the continuation.
And indeed after 15 minutes they returned and the torture resumed.

"UWAAAAAH!" Summer yelled.
"I don't like this." She was forcing a sad frown on her face, difficult as the sides of her mouth were trying to go up.
"Oh no toothbrushes- DON'T YOU DARE USE THEM AGAIN ON ME YOU PSYCHO, I'LL WEEP!

"Aw, you're just saying that"

"I'm not" Summer felt like crying again but they just wouldn't listen. They would not. Get. Off.
"OH MY GOD! FUUUUCK!"

"What the hell you wimp, you act like you're about to die, but you're fine."
"(sob, sob) I wish I wasn't fine."
"OK, then let's continue." Marge said, and spidered her ten babies over Summer's ribs.
Then she dragged just a single finger alongside her armpit
Summer was crying when she noticed she couldn't even distinguish between the different sensations anymore - even just a finger in her armpit was throwing her back in the throes of the same spastic laughter as when both of her soles were suffering. Her self-control was seriously on the brink of leaving her.

"You came for us for a tickling, you wanted this torture right" Margaret teased.

"(sob, sob) Nuu I didn't want this."

"Say you want it. Say you like this."

Summer let out a long, high-pitched howl. She didn't have the energy to hate her anymore, she he just wanted to obey whatever she could to make her stop.
And Margaret just wanted to have more fun training her tickle-slave girl to obey her every command.

Summer was a sweating, quivering mess but she couldn't hope for help from Margaret, the ringleader nor from Abby who looked more turned on by Summer's sorry state than sympathetic.

After 20 minutes of this Margaret FINALLY, FINALLY stopped and glanced at Abby as if saying "Now?"

"Alright Salt, your torture is over...For the moment. Now you can prove your loyalty to us and maybe things can stay that way for a bit longer. Unless you want to die a screaming ticklish death...You should phone your parents an tell us you're staying with us and they shouldn't be looking for you."

Summer's heart was beating fast, could this be her only chance to get away from here?

Abby called Summer's home number. After a while she turned to Margaret.
"It's that sister of hers."
"Even better. Tell her to come over. If you tell her anything else I don't need to tell you what'll happen, right?"

A phone was held to Summer's ear. She heard Mouse's voice, asking why she was calling, unaware that the sister she was was speaking to was tied up and naked.

As Mouse hangs up Abby looks mad as she tickles Summer's feet and summer started to laugh as she pleads for it to stop, Stopppp please." Abby continued to tickle her feet then goes over to her sides and tickles her there. Margaret was on the sidelines as Summer continued to laugh.

111311111111221.content:
Summer's heart dropped when she saw Mouse enter the room alone. She probably just naively obeyed their command to come over alone, and delivered herself right into their trap.

"Summer, what's going on?" Mouse asked confused while Margaret locked the door behind them.

"Welcome to the torture chamber, Summer's sister. We're going to be your hosts. I don't know much about you yet but don't worry: we're all going to get to know each other as friends pretty well by the end of this."

Summer saw Margaret and Abby circling around her sister like vultures.
Why did you just come here instead of calling for help Mouse, why?

Mouse saw that Summer was panting, half-naked and tied up and the coin finally dropped, but there was nowhere to run to. Their captors just laughed at her efforts to get past them. Margaret who was much stronger than even Summer could restrain her effortlessly.

"What to do, what to do..." Margaret mused. "Perhaps we should just continue with Summer's payback..." She slid a finger over her exposed sole.
Summer let out an animal scream.

"Hmm, no, I don't want to use them up too fast. Abby, tie up the little sister."

Over Mouse's protests, they tied her arms and legs to Margaret's bed effortlessly.
Then, to Summer's suprise, Margaret started undoing the ropes that were attaching her to the chair.
As soon as both legs and one hand of her was free, Summer started undoing the other ropes furiously, and was kicked in her side as a reward and fell to the floor next to the bed, sobbing.

Margaret then ordered Abby to tie ropes around Summer's wrists and ankles, and forced her to kneel down at the end of the bed.

"Alright Summer Salt, this is how it goes." she ordered her. "Every time we see you NOT tickling her, we'll start tickling you. And YOU KNOW HOW BAD THAT IS RIGHT."

"In fact," Abby added, grinning. "If you don't tickle her then we will tickle you AND her." She giggled.
"Oh yes! With seconds!"
"And don't think you can get away with just some weak tickles. We will only spare you if you can impress us."

"Oh my gosh" Summer panted. "You two are out of your minds!"

Was there really no way out from this devious trap? She could not bring herself to do all that's been done to her to somebody else, especially her own sister. But maybe the only way out was to make them believe she'd comply...

She remembered something Mouse did to her once, and hoped it'd be enough.
Cursing that she had to make herself look as if she betrayed her, she slid a palm over the left side of Mouse's thigh, then back and over her sides. Mouse barely even giggled and Summer was watching the other two hoping this'd be enough.

"NOnoNo, you're doing it all wrong!" Abby brushed her aside.
"You have to savor all the little reactions, like this, see?" she stated pinching and squeezing Mouse's toes and tummy skin that made the younger sister buckle and unleash a deep throaty laugh.
"OK then. We'll give you a test run and show you how it's done first."

"Wait-I didn't start yet..."
"Too late." Margaret stated brutally.
She switched on the electric toothbrush. "Five minutes start...now!"

She touched her toy to the little sister's sole and Mouse's body immediately became electrified.
Summer closed her eyes (though she couldn't filter out Mouse's desperate laughs and yells). The only thing she could have hope in now was Mouse's extraordinary stamina. She cursed their fate as Mouse laughed herself silly

When it finally was over after what seemed like a lifetime, Abby offered the brush to Summer again.
"Last chance. If you don't do it, it's another fifteen minutes with the brush for BOTH of you!"

Mouse then screamed...

Mouse loves being tickled, her blonde hair always made a mess when she laughs so she tied it up as a ponytail. Summer however absolutely hates being tickled, something Mouse likes to tease her about at home because her extreme ticklishness always used as an advantage by her little sister. And Mouse knows all her most ticklish spots. Summer could hear her heart beating as Mouse considers the offer, which Margaret kindly repeated: to help her and abby tickle Sunmer.

111311111111222.content:
Abby appeared in the door with a fat mustachioed man whom Summer recognized as Margaret's father.

"Oh Shit." Margaret said. Up until now Summer never thought it was actually possible in real life to spell a word with a capital S.

"Margaret Montmorency Allspice!" Mr. Allspice bellowed. "What was that language I just heard? And what in god's name d' you think you're doing?!

"Um, you see..."
Margaret fidgeted but there was really no way she could explain all this.

Mr. Allspice walked over to the other side of the room.
"So these are your friends, huh?" he grumbled like a volcano before erupting.

"No I'm not! Please help me!" Summer shouted.
"Margareeet, did you KIDNAP THIS GIRL?"

"Of course not, she wanted to come..."
"Yes they have! They have captured me and tickled me and they won't stop."

"Shut uuup" Margaret hissed and clasped her hand on Summer's mouth.
"Me and Summer are best friends, right?" She looked at her desperately. "Right?"

"Fuck you." Summer cried. "I hope you die."

Mr. Allspice now was positively steaming, and Margaret and Abby cowered in a corner.

"So! Me and your mother raise you and feed you, we let you go to the big school in the big town even though you know what we think about that..."

Summer laid back and sighed in relief. She didn't care anymore, whatever'd happen it was clear that her torment was over.

"...send you back to boarding school like we SHOULD HAVE all those years ago..."

"NOO! Please dad, not boarding school!"

"The #&@'s she's upset about boarding school for." Summer grumbled. I should be the one crying here, she thought, after what she'd put me through.

"Margaret used to go there before."Abby whispered. "The nuns used to tickle her whenever she made a mistake."
"Good." Summer barked. Her tired and frustrated hands tried to undo the knots on her wrist.

Mr. Allspice seemed to have finished his speech.
"And that's only the beginning!" he added, just because he still had air left in him. "Just wait until your mother hears about this!"
He stopped, tired out by all the stomping, then glanced at Summer & Abby as if their presence had only just occurred to him.

"Come to think of it...What exactly is your relationship to my daughter?"

11131111111122212.content:
Soon the two were hiding behind a billboard near a bus stop at the edge of the town.

"This is the service that leaves for that infamous boarding school. We're lucky that it is operated even on the weekends."
"Oh, the Featherton students do not get the weekends off." Abby commented.
"Well it's lucky for us then...Wait, what did you say?"
"About the weekends?"
"No...about the school's name."
"It's the Featherton Boarding School for Troublesome Girls (FEATHERBOA), founded by Sir Featherton. Is that wrong?"
"I'm...not sure." I wonder if it has anything to do with the Featherton Manor on the other side of town? Note to self to investigate it later.

"But what are we doing here now" Abby whined. "Margie does not leave on this bus until later."
"Abby, THINK. We have to go to school on weekdays. The only time we can scout that school is now. Maybe we can find some dirt on the place that can make Mr Allspice change his mind."
"Ooh, I see. Summer, you are so smart." Abby said in a kissing up voice, she clearly was aware that her fate depended on the goodwill of a person who had no pressing reason to give any.

There was some commonition and a group of girls appeared, walkking in a straight line.

"Look at those uniforms! And they all look so...skinny!" Summer gasped.

The person in the forefront suddenly stopped, and looked around with an expression like she had found a worm in her salad.
"Abigail Carston." She said. "Your collar is disorderly. That's a 10 minute penalty."
"EEEE!"
Three girls jumped Abigail (who was skinny as a rake) with 30 manicured fingers. The leader watched it with a cold expression. They continued until she was completely out of breath, then left the panting girl on the ground.

As the girls moved in to board the bus, Summer signalled to Abby.
"Now's our chance."

As soon as the coast was clear, she moved but realized too late that she wasn't entirely on her own after all. "Oh hey" she giggled. "You're not from here are you?"
"No." she decided that it'd be best to tell the truth. "I came here looking for a friend. Why aren't you on your classes?"
"I snuck out." she giggled again. "And they can't do anything about it because they can't find out, no~oh!"

"So where is she...?"
"In the punishment room. In my place, eh-eh-eh!
Six hours of tickle-torture for three months of missed homeworks!"

Ken pushed the dog back into its cage and shut the door. When he walked back the few steps to Summer his smile became wide. "Hey Todd, look how much she leaked." His finger pointed towards a large dark spot on the girl's school uniform skirt, wet inner thighs and a puddle on the floor. "I wonder where that came from..." To Summer's horror Todd lifted her skirt to reveal light blue panties, which had become dark blue panties at the center. "Put that down you meanie!" Ken meanwhile arrived at her bare, slicky feet and gave them a quick but harsh tickling. The girl screamed in surprise, while her wet panties were still on display for the boys. "Say please" Todd ordered.

Summer was not yet prepared for such submission. Her mind raced. While the boys were looking at her, curious for her response, her sharp mind shifted into a higher gear. "You boys are really in trouble for breaking the rules." Ken looked in surprise towards Todd, fear in his eyes. Todd shook his head but dropped the skirt. "Naah we can peek anytime we want." It was clear to Summer that the boys really worried about breaking written rules. And they had indeed. Meanwhile the girl saw the piece of paper in front of her inner eyes. "No, you silly chaps. The rules say that for sports/PE which is not done barefoot there is a Level 2 punishment. And Level 2 means one hour with basic tickling tools only. The dog does not belong to the basic tools but the animal section. You used the dog illegally on me." The boys looked at each other, aghast.

Todd took a hard breath and muttered "You cannot prove anything". Ken winced when Summer responded. "Oh there are many traces. On my feet, at the dog, and on Ken's fingers. No way you can clean this up without proper cleaning items, and none of the them are in this room. Unlucky" she smiled.

What did the boys do?

The tied up little detective in her awkward position with the chair with its backrest on the floor, her bare thighs rising upwards and her bare hyper ticklish soles showing to the world, was becoming more nervous due to the unknown intruder. Abby and Margaret were chuckling and indicating in a low voice "you go there and take this, and have fun". Summer flinched when she felt fingers caressing her soft underside of her arm close to her protected armpit. "Oooooohh not again. Let me gooohooohoooo" she whined while her skin's nerves reacted to the light teasing. Luckily her arms, which were tied at the wrists at the backrest, allowed her to press her arms to her body to deny access to her armpits.

But this was only a short term gain. "Hiiiihaaaaaarggggh tooooooomuuuuchitticklesohshi" she screamed when additional twenty fingers scribbled over sole and top of her left foot. She wiggled her foot as much as she could, which was not much. The fingers switched into a quick sequence of stroking and fast tracing, creating curious sounds of moaning and disappointing despair.

Mustering her strength she cried "Help me aaargh who came in. This is tortureiiiiiekk". Instead she felt a hand on her thigh, followed by another hand. Three people, she counted by now. When one of the new hands squeezed her thigh next to her kneecap while the other one was simply resting halfway up, she bucked and cried more pitiful.

111311111112.content:
Summer felt a light itching on her right underarm. Instantly she tried to push it away with her other arm, in vain because it was tied tightly to the chair. It appeared again on her left underarm. She flinched and wiggled her arms as much as the restrictions allowed. 'There is nothing there.' Summer said to herself. It is just imagination. But it came back. Now something soft lightly trailed from the the elbows to her wrists. About half way was the poor girl's weakest point. She squealed when the feather went by. Otherwise it seemed to be just bearable.

It got worse when the number of feathers first increased to two, then doubled again. Now her skin had not time to recover from the light teasing but shouted for scratching to be believed. But Summer could not do anything about it. The young detective bit her lips, clenched her teeth, sighed and begged for stopping the teasing. It was partly successful because the feathers were now back again to two.

"Haaaaaaa" she screamed when she felt her head being squeezed to something warm and wet, in an arm lock. When she heard Abby's voice very, very close and felt her lips touching her ear, a high pitched squeal followed. That's why she missed the first few seconds of what Abby had to say to her. But the merciless girl held her victim tightly and continued to whisper into her ear. "...will tickle torture every single inch of you. You will beg, plead, fight, break and cry. And find out that it will not help you." Summer was overwhelmed by fear. She had seriously miscalculated this step and would pay dearly. "Please not" she managed to say between the squealing from the ticklish feeling on her ear and underarms. "I will do an oath." This was the strongest proposal she could think of, although she instantly thought about how to avoid a breach.

"Yes you will. But you will find out that this will even not be necessary." The feathers had finally ceased to tease her underarm.

But it got worse for Summer. How?
- feather in her ear

111311111112.title: Feathers on her underarms

1113111112.content:
Abby looked up to Summer, whose face was already becoming rosy from the tickling. The tied up little detective wore clothes appropriate for summer. Having lost her shoes already, the legs were bare up to the knees where a dotted yellow skirt covered the calves. From her sitting position at Summer's legs she could see something bright peeking from under the skirt. She stared at the place a bit too long, as Summer slammed her legs tight. "What are you thinking?" the tied up girl complained.

Abby felt caught too early. She kneeled in front of Summer and squeezed the bare legs just over the kneecaps. "AaaaaaaghOhhhhhhhToooomuuccch Pleasse" the girl howled. But the strong hands were pinching again and again. Summer tried to hop around with the whole chair, screaming and pleading. "Stooooooooooop" she screamed. "Open your legs" Abby commanded. Her captive opened her mouth but did not say anything. Abby pinched again. "Open your legs and you will get a short break". After very few seconds Summer opened her legs a bit, just as much as she thought she could tolerate. She already needed any break she could get.

"Abby, you are really speeding up" Margaret cackled from the kitchen. She had the same thoughts, but would have delivered more tickle torture before. "Good girl" she heared Abby say sweetly. "Oh no no no, please not there" she heard Summer moan.

Meanwhile Abby took a new position next to Summer's side. "After this break we will explore more ticklish flesh" she said, while very slowly lifting up Summer's shirt. "Leave that down" the helpless detective commanded. But inch for inch of the girl's tight upper body was revealed. Her tummy and bellybutton - an outie - were flawless. Her ribs protuded, making Abby smile even brighter. That would be a tickle feast. Her fingers just touched the warm skin when the shirt was reaching the little plain white sports bra below. "Hey, don't expose my top" Summer tried to sound firm, but the shirt rose further. Abby then pulled it over the girl's head, where it rested on her neck in a roll.

Where to start now? Sides? Bellybutton? Ribs?
1113111112.title: Abby takes off Summer's shirt for some uppe...

11131111123.content:
"You will beg me to reveal much more later." Abby threatened the tied girl. "Unless you like to be tickled here...and there...and there..", thereby running her fingers in fast poking moves, from the sides of Summer's chest over her ribs, belly, sides and hips. Her victim clenched her teeth and tried to hold it, but the harsh tickling made her squeal in agony.

Judging from the results the ribs were the spot which caused the most discomfort for Summer. And Abby wanted to exploit it. "Oh look at those sweet little ribs." she cooed. "I can see each one of them. I wonder how many there are..." Summer shook her head. "You cannot see all of them. And no need to count. There are twelve pairs of them." Abby tilted her head. "You freak know the number of your ribs?" The little detective sighed. "Not only mine. Every human has the same number in general." Abby had enough of this lecture. "OK, let's play a game. I indicate them and you count them. One." and Abby poked with her fingers into Summer's sides, inching up until she met some resistance. "Iiiiiiiieeeeeeeek Nooooo" the poor preteen girl screamed. "You think you are smart but you have forgotten already the only rule of this game. Again" and Abby repeated the step, now knowing where to poke and soon finding her target. "Oooooowiiiiee not so hard." Silence. "One", Summer hastily added, having no appetite having Abby to repeat. "Aaaahaaa haaaaa twooooooo". And it went on.

Abby had a lot of fun. She did not really care whether she did the same one again or skipped one, but Summer cared. "Weeeehaaadthisssonee" she shouted when Abby lingered too long. "I don't think so" was a casual response. When number six or seven was reached, by Abby's counting, she encountered the sports bra's cover.

It was also clear that there would not be a one-off solution. Targeting Margaret would have her retaliate even if Summer could deliver a good blow, i.e. solve a mystery that the girl was responsible for.

Summer decided to discuss with Mouse what had happened at their school and town over the last couple of weeks that could be considered as unusual or unexpected. In a second step they would decide for which of those incidents the duo was suspect of being involved in. Surprisingly quite a lot incidents, minor and major, came back from Mouse's mind. The top five events were finally decided. The most relevant event seemed to be the mysterious "sickness" of a new boy in their school two weeks ago. His parents had bought a shop in town, forcing him to move to the school during the term. He had been there for a few weeks when he was reported to be sick for two days. Not only that he had told at least two differing stories what had caused him to stay at home. Summer had overheard his mother saying that the boy "had not been really sick, but, you know, we could not tell anyone..." before they were out of earshot. The boy, who was open minded and friendly before, seemed to have panic when too many girls were around him now.

"Sis, you know Jeremy, the boy whose parents took over that shop downtown?" Mouse shook her head. How was she supposed to keep track of her bigger sister's numerous boy contacts? "I know the shop and something you said about it, but I have not seen him ever. Is he suspicious of having done something?" Summer shook her head. "Not done something, but something mysterious happened to him. I'd like to find out." Mouse cocked her head. "Why would you like to? Is he cute?" Her sister shook her head again, more energetically. "No, I mean yes, I mean I just...Hey. Stop that. I am a detective, and irrespective of the person, I want to inquire." Mouse was grinning. "Hmhm. Sure."

Her sister was just too young to understand the serious tasks assigned to such role, Summer thought. She may be of use still. Keeping her on board could mean that Summer could delegate some lower tasks to her. "He does not accept invitations and refuses to meet anyone after school. His mother picks him up just after the bell." Mouse pondered. "If they own a shop they must have money. Maybe mum wants to sell some jewels to them. We could come along." Summer frowned. Good ideas were her own resort. But maybe this was a good proposal from her assistant. What else? Meeting him by chance somewhere was not really probable. Summer wondered why she thought of the two of the same time since as Serafine and Karen did not actually know each other too well; it's just, from Summer's entire class, they were the two who were usually alone.

Serafine was a quiet girl who had braided hair and wore specs. Her tiny, thin figure was made more jug-like by a large butt. She was nice but always seemed too shy to say what was actually on her mind.

Karen was a South American girl who was put down as the "ugly" girl of the class, though that was quite unfair - if anything, she was merely completely normal.
Not very tall, but enough to not to be called short. Neither strongly built nor thin.
And she had big feet, and a round face.

From what Summer remembered, neither had any friends at school (though Karen had a big family and definitely knew many other people). So, Summer reasoned, they probably wouldn't mind if she called one of them to the other's place to use as a meet-up spot.

She decided to call Karen first. The latino girl did not seem to mind. "Yeah, sure, I just finished taking out the wash for my mother. I'll be free soon."

She laughed when she heard what Summer was up to.
"Mysteries? Girl you got some weird ass imagination."

However, she did not make any effort to leave.
That casual attitude about her, the way she just went along with whatever her friends suggested was one of the things that made her likeable.

Serafine was trying to hide behind the door as usual when they knocked. She was wearing a sweater and cotton mary janes. She continued to sneak around behind the other two as Summer attempted to explain her idea, about asking around

Within five minutes, Mouse and her sister were struggling in hog-ties on the cabin floor. They couldn't speak up because their captor even carefully gagged them with some strings and socks.

"Now you kids think about what you've done while I figure out what to do with you."

About five minutes laughter, all the while Summer was busy rolling around and trying to find a weakness in the ropes, something cast a huge shadow on the floor at the front door and a large woman entered.

The gargantuan figure of a person who was more wide than tall towered over them.

Alisha was an extraordinarily ugly woman.
Pimpled face, huge voluptuous lips, piggish nose, and two golden buck teeth.
She licked her lips as she was sizing up the captives.

"Little kids like them are best when crazy with laughter."

Mouse went
"MPPPPPHMMMMPHMFAHAHAHAMF" (Let me go, you creep! Noo not the soles!)

Alisha cackled.

Mind I play with them a little, father?

Alisha left the room but soon returned with a rope with some hooks...

The neighborhood meanie seemed prepared for just such an intrusion, and as he dragged the kicking and fighting sisters downstairs, they were quickly and proficiently bound with zip-ties and silenced with their own socks crammed into mouths and tied fast by scarves.

         Now that Mr. Jeffries had them thus incapacitated, he set to freeing each long enough to place them into more serious restraints. The basement below the shack was dominated by a stout support beam, and he set to securing each of the girls with their arms tied above their heads on separate sides of the vertical beam, facing away from each other. Next, he tied Summerâ€™s ankles to the ends of a spreader bar, so that she was totally helpless with her back to the beam now. He then brought over a wooden seat with stocks to lock Mouseâ€™s feet into so that she was seated on the opposite side of the pole from Summer, arms high over her own head, seated with her ankles trapped in the stocks. 1113222.title: The Secret Tickle Torture Chamber of Mr. Jeffries

11132222.content:
The mean old man rummaged through a drawer and pulled out an old scrub brush.
Just the sight of it already tickled Summer's feet.

"Five minutes with my "Meanness Melter" and even the nastiest kid will learn o' to behave " he grumbled.

Something occurred to Mouse, a memory from several years ago.
They were singing a made-up nursery rhyme with the other kids, she couldn't remember who started it or what the exact words were up until now, when they came rushing back. Just how old was Mr Jeffries anyway?

At any rate, it went:

Mean old man, mean old man Jeffries,
If you make him mad he'll tickle off your tootziez.

If you dodge your homework or you tell a lie,
They'll call him and he will surely make you cry

...and the next two verses, whose meaning didn't quite register back then, until now:

If the takes his, if the takes his tools out,
What will I do, one will I do, scream and shout.

Funny times, funny times in the stocks,
If you sit there make sure you don't lose your socks.

Mouse's toes scrunched desperately on her remaining sock, but a pair of large hands came over and peeled it off without the slighest effort.
11132222.title: Laughing limericks

choices: Jeffries comes back with a bucket of warm water and a cake of soap for the brush
Jeffries unties her and holds her down to tickle her feet with his tools
111322221.content:
Old Man Jeffries raised the scrub brush high, feinted a few times to get Mouse's nerves on edge, then lowered the "Meanness Melter" brush to her feet and started scrubbing. Side to side, up and down the brush went, driving the girl to absolute hysterics as soon as it touched her. Her neighbor made sure to press extra hard to drive the brush into the wrinkles of her clenched feet, eliciting extra shrieks from Mouse as she struggled in her bonds.

The brush's bristles had been worn down to the point of softness long ago, but the sheer firmness with which Jeffries rubbed the tool on her feet made the tickling intense still. Mouse threw her head back and howled, yelling and thrashing as her sister looked on in horror. The bristles felt like small tongues or fingers lapping at every square micrometer of her heels, balls, and arches.

She had to escape- there was no way she could survive tickling like this for more than a few more minutes. Yet Mouse knew deep within her heart there was more to come; she and Summer should never have intruded into the man's house.

He finally abated for a moment, and left the room after pledging to return with more tools of torture.

"Yes officer I found them sneaking about in my back yard" Mr Jeffries told the police officer at the door.
The girls could not say anything in their defense except "mmph", because they both were tied up and struggling on the floor with old socks in their mouths, Mr Jeffries was not taking any chances while the police got there.

"Must be one of them delinquent youth you hear about, make sure you punish them thoroughly! Put them in a dark cell! With plenty of rats!"
The officer looked doubtful about this but to Summer's regret he wasn't looking at them any friendlier either.
Oh no, Summer's heart cried out, could we have become criminals?

"Come on! Can you walk?" the officer called out for them.
Summer couldn't, being still tied up, but she managed to get herself up and balance herself out on her two feet (as the police officer showed no intent to untie them). Then she hopped to the police car best as she could. Mouse, with some difficulty, like a worm, crawled behind.
Then the car with wailing sirens carried them off to the local police station.

"You kids have been caught trespassing, a serious offense, if you were a little older you could go to jail over this."
a police officer informed them.

Mouse and Summer were scared to death, what if their parents hear about this?
"Oh no if I get punished for breaking the law can I even be a detective anymore" Summer was worried by this the most.
"Oh detective smetective, if you didn't only think about that stuff we wouldn't be in this trouble now in the first place!" Mouse cried out angrily. "This is all your fault!" she said, and pounded on her sister's sides with her fists.

"Well there is a way for you kids to get out of this, you have to accept taking part in our delinquent youth reformation programme."
"Yes! Yes! Anything!"
"Good. I'll take you to meet our psychologist."
The girls were taken over to a smaller interrogation room, where a friendlier officer sat them down and pulled their still-tied legs over the table, securing them to the tabletop with a bit more rope.
"See girls, we usually find that the reason that children misbehave is because their parents aren't paying them enough attention or properly teaching what's right or wrong.
They are spoiling you, in fact. What we need to instill in you is a fear of wanting to commit the crime in the first place.
Our education programme is to show you that you can't commit naughtiness without receiving proportional punishment."

She pulled out a feather from a locker drawer.
"Now, what would you girls like first, the fingers or the feathers?"

11132231.content:
Summer groaned while Mouse sniffed. "No tickling please. We were just checking if..." Mouse went on but stopped in her sentence when she saw the stern look of the otherwise friendly looking woman's face. "I will only say this once. I ask a question and the one I ask, or both, answer it directly. I don't want to hear lengthy explanations or other lies. Did you get that?" Summer and Mouse both nodded. Both hands of the woman dashed forward and scribbled furiously over the poor girls' feet. Shrill screaming echoed through the room, followed by silence. "The only answer to that question would have been Yes, Madam'' Again, did you get that?" This was followed by almost identical girlish voices confirming this.

The woman smiled again and placed both hands again on the girl's feet, making them squirm. "That is much better. Now I will tell you how our correction method works. One of you will read out a text. After each paragraph the other one will repeat it. For deeper understanding she will get tickled during this exercise. After that we will switch." The woman continued to smile. "We will see now many paragraphs will be necessary." With a stern look towards Mouse again. "This will also improve reading abilities." Mouse glanced back but bit on her lip.

The Chinese man that marched in could've been called extraordinarily tall, had it not been for Western (rather than Asian) standards.

1113223221.content:
Why'd a person she had never met show up and pretend to be her "claimant"? Summer smelled a rat. A large, bespectacled rat.

The way the officer was bowing and kissing up to this man only served to strengthen her suspicion that something fishy was going on.

The police officer turned back to the sisters.
"Now, girls, Dr. Ti Ling here is a renowned genius looking for volunteers for his project. You know how we sometimes let criminals' prison sentence go if they agree to participate in some harmless medical experiments? It'd be the same. You go with Dr. Ti-Ling and we'll forget this little affar, what do you say?"

Summer's face betrayed nothing, but inside she felt offended. This buffoon was talking to them taking them for idiots - just because they were children.
And even deeper, a small anger started growing into boiling rage - who knows how many kids WOULD have fallen for it, or already did?

So she said...

11132232212.content:
"Excellent! Now, if you'll just sign the paperwork here that says that you two had left the station safe and sound..."
Summer didn't resist.
What was the point, she thought, if the game was already rigged?
But her mind was already working on an escape plan.

"Good! Now, girls, remember to do all that Doctor Li-Ting says, okay?"
"We will. Thank you, officer."
(And maybe I'll just blow your little game wide open if I get the chance too, Summer added.)

They followed the man, who stayed silent, to his car.

"To the lab." the doctor ordered. The girls' eyes opened wide when they entered the facility. It was a humongous building, with glass elevators, ramps, and large interior spaces.

"Why have you brought us here?" Summer blurted out when she couldn't take the tension any longer.

"This is my research company." the man said in an emotionless voice. "I started out as a doctor, then a research scientist, now I'm CEO. It's a lot of responsibility. You make a lot of sacrifices, just to make sure the company stays afloat."
"I'm not sure if I understand that."
"Hah. How could you. You are children."

They walked in silence for a while, then Summer said.
"But you haven't actually answered my question..."
"Hmph. Well, you'll find out anyway soon enough. All the research here hit a critical reef. The truth is we couldn't progress anymore with only animal experiments. And human subjects, well, the...media watchdogs, human rights organizations, and the trade unions, they just ask too many questions.

So, this is the road that remains. To negotiate private deals with people who have little other choice that the institutions will not find out about. unethical. But believe me, all that work here have paid their own price."

"But that is evil!"

"There are not good or evil in business or science, Summer Salt."

"You know my name..."

"Of course I know you. My other daughter has talked about you a lot."

Something about the man's wrinkles and expression looked familiar...

"Pao-Ting's...
But...
You'd even kidnap the classmate of your daughter???"

"It's only one small brick on the path to success, Summer Salt."

Summer had to ask the question she didn't want to ask.

"So...What you want to do with us is..?"

"Experiments in human sensitivity."

Of course.
"You're going to tickle us! Please no!"

"You'll get used to it.
Don't worry about it.
We wouldn't do anything you couldn't take.
We aren't savages here.

Health, physical and mental, and safety of the experiments is constantly monitored.
We'd never force you into anything..."Age inappropriate", either."

"But...we would still be tickled."

"Oh yes, that's kind of the point."

Summer tried to think of a way out of this, so she asked...
11132232212.title: "...Sure, I guess." (the mystery of the doctor)

"This goes on deeper than you'd know. You'll have been kept here by your own will. Nothing illegal will have happened."

112.title: The attic

1121.content:
A sudden flash of light from a metal reflecting a tiny ray of sunlight that had made its way from the roof caught Summer's eye.
She stopped and looked to the side. The young detective could not spot the source any more since clouds again hid the sun. Mouse meanwhile
had moved along and stood a few yards ahead, also looking at something.

Large cloths of linen covered the larger items, leaving shapes to imagination. Summer straddled carefully a long wooden bar and
and slipped down on the other side to search what seemed to her to have signaled to the sleuth. Maybe something valuable or a beacon of someone
in need could be found there. The girl squeezed through a gap between a big cupboard and a pillar to get closer to the thing under another linen that she thought was the one.

It looked like "Shackles?", Summer murmured. When she tilted her head for a closer examination she heard Mouse calling from further away. "Summer, come over here. Quick. I need your help in..." her voice trailed.

What would Summer do?
- Call Mouse to come back herself
- Follow Mouse, it sounded urgent
1121.title: An antique medieval torture device

11211.content:
Whatever Mouse had discovered it would certainly be no match for Detective Summer's result of her sharp eyes. Impatiently Summer shouted "Mouse, come back. I found something BIG."
After years of resignation that resulted from her bigger sister not really being interested in what Mouse discovered, the younger girl made her way back on her bare feet with meanwhile black soles.
It was easy to notice Summer crouching down and tugging at the linen cover.

The linen was tugged under the heavy gear. Summer could not pull it out. "I will get a scissors" Mouse said and moved back towards the entrance to the attic. "No, stop" her sister commanded.
Mouse was not a suitable sister or assistant for a proper detective. Cutting the linen would mean that everyone who went up there would see that someone had found what was intended to be hidden.
Summer's eyes followed two little paths of footprints. The dust would have to be restored, but that could be done much later.

With the combined effort they finally managed to pull the end of the cover. When they lifted it both girls gaped in awe. It was a

- wine cask with shackles
- strange device
11211.title: Call Mouse

112111.content:
The girls unveiled a large, round cask. Made of solid ebony wood with iron straps it looked worn but still impressive. The flat ends looked to the left and right, while one of those ends was next to a chest so they could not see it. Wondering why they still could not roll it made them discover that it had a solid metal foot incorporated where the diameter maximum was. From both sides shackles protruded which seemed to be fixed by chains that might be extended from the interior of the cask, like anchors. Pulling at them did not help.

Mouse frowned. Would the poor people who had to carry the cask have their wrists shackled to it to prevent them running away with precious content? Was it an overly complex mechanism to fix it into a metal ring in a cellar to keep thefts in despair?

Summer was not convinced. She did not see a proper opening where some liquid could be poured into it or be removed? There was no tap and no wooden cover where a tap might sit. Only where one pair of the shackles was resting there were gaps in the wood, cut by human hand. But pushing or pulling did not avail.

Mouse meanwhile peeked into the gap where the chest was standing. "There is something odd. Some bars." She sneezed from having inhaled layers of dust, in turn blowing up further dust until she was coughing in the middle of a little dust cloud. "Let's move the chest then." Summer commanded, before she allowed her younger sister to enjoy some support. "Well spotted sis." The chest was heavy, as a proper filled chest should be, but moving it one foot was enough. Both girls saw two bars of wood protruding from a center, like a primitive steering wheel. When they turned it with combined force it moved with metallic clicking sound. The chains of the shackles extended from their hiding.

Summer felt hot by now. Her sister kept staring at her, probably thinking "my big sister is not as good a detective as she thinks.". She had to do something. An idea came to her mind. "Lie down over the cask." Mouse protested. "I don't. If you lock me up and go away I would be here on my own in this dusty place." Confirming her view she sneezed again. Dust tickled inside her nose, making her rub it. "Silly girl. I will not go away. And I will not lock you up. At least not until I have found the keys." Mouse was not convinced but carefully put her belly onto the cold wood and steel. Her skirt rose when she stretched herself. She could reach the shackles. It was not really comfortable but it would only be for a short test, she thought.

While she was in her position she found that there was an uneven surface where the elbows rested. She rubbed them there and told Summer what she had discovered. Her big sister pondered. Did they really...? "Mouse, turn around" Summer told her younger sister. Obeying she slipped down from the cask to put her feet the other way. "No, not that. Lie down on your back." Mouse looked at her with wide eyes. "I am not so flexible. This is weird." She shivered from the thougt of being exposed that way. "Please sis I want to solve this riddle." Again, Mouse complied. She bent backwards. It was not painful, just odd. "Look. I can reach the shackles." Summer saw that they did not have key holes but were open on one side. She put the wrists and ankles of her younger sister into the shackles. She looked cute. Her panties protuded as her skirt had risen.

"Ok, let me out." Mouse casually kicked her left foot to pull at the chain.
BANG. Instantly the chains retracted. Through the flaps Mouses's feet disappeared into the device. The chains were much shorter now, stretching the girl properly. "Owweeee help me pleaaase" she wined. "I will pull at the wheel to the other side". Summer raced to the wooden bars. They moved just one click into the other direction.

"Aaaaah" Mouse screamed. "Something is poking into my butt. Stinging." Summer tried to keep calm although she almost panicked. Squeezing tightly into the gap her eyes were within inches of the center of the wooden wheel. She saw that it had two little flaps, just enough for two fingers. Should she try and stick her fingers into it. Would she be trapped as well or find the key for the solution?

While she pondered she heard something ticking.

Trapped
Solution
112111.title: Cask

Summer decided to follow Mouse, in case she had gotten in trouble. Summer climbed back over the wooden bar, looking down the attic towards where she had last seen Mouse, but she couldn't see where Mouse had went from here, but she could easily follow Mouse's dusty footsteps at very least.
