11212.title: Follow Mouse

112121.content:
Summer gasped when she turned the corner, Mouse was up ahead, trapped in what was a very fancy, but clearly secure, cage.

Running over to where Mouse was, she could see Mouse through the bars, embarrassment turning the younger girls face a deep red color.

"How did you get trapped inside?" Summer asked her sister.

"I wasn't gonna go far inside, I just wanted to look" Mouse squeaked in reply "But when I got inside just a little, I saw something sparkle in front of me, and when I tried to grab it, the door locked behind me"

"What sparkled?" Summer questioned

"I don't know, I couldn't find it once the door closed" replied Mouse

Summer looked around a little more before she decided to:
-Looks for a key to let Mouse out
-Examines the cage a little more closely
112121.title: Caged Mouse

1121212.content:
"This is a mystery worthy of a Detective such as me" Summer announces

"What do you mean?" Asks Mouse

"Well where did the 'sparkly' thing go, and how did the door close by itself, and what is this even doing here anyway are all mysteries that need to be explained!" declares Summer

Summer kneels down and begins looking over the cage more closely, while clearly sturdy the cage Mouse was trapped in had a clearly fancy look to it. Summer ran he hands over the bars of the cage, and was surprised to find a pair of holes in the door. Looking more closely, she could see there was also a bar that could be lowered to trap anything that was poking out of those holes and prevent them from moving.

"How interesting" Summer said

And with that Summer decided to:
-Tell Mouse to stick her feet through the holes in the door
-Explore the rest of the attic without Mouse
1121212.title: Examine Cage

112122.content:
Summer suddenly felt a blow on her back, it wasn't painful, but it made her stumble forwards, then fall to the ground.

Looking up, Summer saw she had fell close to a tall post that went from the ground all the way to the roof, and attached to the post was a heavy chain. Quickly rolling over, Summer tried to see where she had been attacked from, and saw Mouse jumping down from the boxes behind where Summer was standing.

Mouse quickly grabbed the other end of the chain that was attached to the post and giggled "The great detective Summer has been tricked and captured by the evil villian"

Summer saw the chain was attached to an iron collar which Mouse was trying to place around Summer's neck.

Summer then:
-Heard a click as Mouse locked the collar around Summer's neck
-Rolled away before Mouse could trap her
112122.title: Summer Attacked!

choices: Mouse chuckles, and tries to release Summer
Mouse is attacked by an unknown entity.
1121221.content: Summer heard a click, and realized her sister had locked the chain that was hanging from the ceiling around her neck.
1121221.title: Summer collared

choices: Continue to research the Omega papers
113.content:
Mr. Salt's study was the biggest and nicest room in the house.
In the middle of the room, four tables were pulled together to hold up the heaps of documents that had been piled on top of them. Most of them were in Dad's handwriting and contained his personal notes and story ideas, but the depths of that pile also held curious newspaper cut-outs, dictionaries for strange, rare languages, maps to faraway countries, copies of police and FBI reports, antique first editions of rare books, and unknown people's personal diaries.

Summer also knew for a fact that somewhere in Dad's study there'd a secret safe (possibly more than one), but it was not worth looking for as it only held what Mr. Salt considered to be his greatest treasure: the manuscript of his next upcoming book. For all his skepticism towards danger that characterized him, Mr. Salt was deeply paranoid when it came to one specific fear: he was convinced that greedy reporters would be lurking on every corner seeking to steal his book, and reveal it to the audience before the publisher could. When he was close to finishing a book, not even the sisters were allowed to come near the study.

Summer walked to the head of the table and picked up some pages from the top of the pile.

One of them was a letter from the editor, with a picture of the next book's cover.
For some reason, all of dad's covers had guns and roses in them, whether they also featured mean-looking yet scantily dressed men and women to hold them or not.
Another page turned out to be the cover page of an earlier draft, with the current title at the top:

#23th novel
"Dear, stop or I'll shoot first!" by Stephen J. Salt

while some previous titles had been crossed out:
Who Took My Squirrel?
Three Men and a Rowboat.
The Red Rose.
The Omega Clue.

It was then that Summer spotted the blue dossier which lay in pile inconspicuously. As she pulled it out, a bunch of old photos fell out. Intrigued, she sat down and began to read.

Mouse, not nearly as excited by a bunch of files as Summer, opted to inspect Dad's souvenirs instead.
Right next to a big cabinet that held Dad's awards (plaquettes, diplomas and trophies) from various writers' associations, there were a bunch of shelves that held the collection that Mr. Salt dragged back home with him from his trips.
Just like with the documents, it was sometimes difficult to tell which one of them was junk and which ones highly valuable.
Mouse right now was examining a monkey statuette, about 10 inches tall, with glass (?) gemstones for eyes.

Meanwhile, Summer was making an amazing discovery.
Mr. Salt in the research of his novel had stumbled upon an ancient mystery called the Omega Code.
The code was used as a secret language first by the Soviets, but was subsequently stolen and utilized by the Americans during the Cold War. It was based on an old African language that nobody ever was able to decipher. Thus, the code hold significance not just for scholars of ancient history, but also to intelligence agencies who wanted to gain access to USA or Russian state secrets.
To Mr. Salt, this was only material to work from; but Summer could see that without noticing it, her dad has collected all the evidence he'd have needed to solve the code.
It was all there, waiting for a person who could decipher them, such as herself, to come along.

What should the sisters do?
113.title: Dad's room

1131.content:
The doorbell rang, and Mouse leaped to the task. Summer could not pay attention; she was too busy with a good part in the blue dossier to focus.

When Mouse ran into the anteroom and threw the door open, however, she found herself face to face with a person she had never seen before.
1131.title: Strange visitors

choices: She spied the beggar talking to two other men in the back yard.
She went back to her room to prepare, "Home Alone"-style.
11311.content:
On the porch stood the ugliest and smelliest old man Mouse had ever come across. Even including Ms. Hobbs, and her house smelled of cat piss and old people.

He grinned at her, showing his full row of eight whole teeth.

"Mornin', kiddo. 'ould yer paren's be a' home?"

"No." Mouse said, then corrected herself. "Who's asking?"

The old man smiled his creepy smile again.
"I'm an ol' friend of your daddy an' mommy, I am. Knew them 'rom skul, I am. May I come in?"

"You stink." Mouse remarked.

"Confounded brat" the stranger remarked. "Just do what I say and get o' of the way."

Mouse got scared and slammed the door shut. There was some cursing from the other side, then it all went quiet.

Mouse ran back into Dad's study. "Summer, there was a creepy old man trying to come in through the front door!"

"Mm-hmm." Summer said, not looking up. Mouse could see it was hopeless, her sister was caught up in something in her dream world again. It was up to her, Mouse Salt, to protect the house.
11311.title: A creepy-looking beggar

113111.content:
Mouse noticed the movement behind the house through the rear window. She quickly ran there and opened the window slightly ajar, then pressed her ear to the slit.

"I'm tellin' you, them two kids are alone in there like my middle finger." The beggar's raspy voice went. "You can trust ol' Harry Grimes."

"I hope so. If that's the right house, then we can't afford any complications. We..." The second voice suddenly went quiet. Mouse pulled her head down. The three dark silhouettes outside disappeared.

Mouse put her fist in her mouth. What should she do in this situation?

(all 3 options include telling Summer)
113111.title: She spied the beggar talking to two other men

choices: Invite him in (but do not tell him about the room)
11312.content:
A reporter stood in the door.

"Ah, good day, miss." He tipped his hat. "Are you a member of this house?"

"And what do you want?" Mouse asked scornfully.

"Ah, well, I'm a reporter from a newspaper and I'm interested in your dad's work..."

"Oh no! You came to steal Dad's book and you're going to tickle-torture me until I tell you where you can find it!"
Mouse shouted.
She threw herself to the ground, and closed one eye, but the other eye was looking up hopefully.

"Um, I wasn't planning to do anything like that."

"Oh. ...Drat." Mouse climbed back onto her feet.

"Mouse, who are you talking to?" Summer emerged from the back room and arrived to the scene.

The figure tipped his hat again.
"Oh, I'm so happy to meet you. My name is Chinnery. J. R. Chinnery. I'm from the Gazette."
Summer was staring at him suspiciously.

"Dad...Can't come to answer the door at the moment."

"Oh, I'm well aware, miss. I was informed in advance by my boss that Mr. Salt would be out of town for the weekend. I just thought I'd take this opportunity to introduce myself to his family - and to offer my help should they need an extra hand for anything. I don't mind telling you, miss, any information on Mr Salt's research is probably of great interest to our readers "

"Well" Summer said. "Maybe I'll have a better story for you soon."

"How so?"

"The truth is..." Summer lowered her voice to a whisper. "I'm not just a school girl - I'm also secretly a detective!"

"Do tell!"

"Yes, and I'm actually working on a very promising case right now. I'm sure that when I solve it, it's going to be in all the newspapers!

The gentleman bowed.
"Well, when you've got a story, Miss Salt, Chinnery will be at your service."

"Right!" Summer said, beaming with pride.

She hesitated. Chinnery seemed nice enough, but she shouldn't be too trusting with strangers.
11312.title: A reporter

choices: Mouse encourages Chinnery to tickle the information out of them
Summer changes her mind and decides to share the dossier after all
113122.content:
“Wait” Summer called, half reluctantly, just as Chinnery turned to leave. “You know, maybe there are a few things we could discuss… if you’d like to come in for a few minutes. I’m familiar with some of my dad’s research and I’m sure he wouldn’t mind if I divulged just a few details.”

Chinnery turned around with an expression of delighted curiosity, though betraying a hint of triumph which didn’t escape Summer’s attention. “Why Miss Salt, you do me a tremendous service and I promise I’ll only take up a few minutes of your time” he said merrily as he stepped over the threshold.

“Please, come into the living room! Would you like a drink?” Summer offered.

“A cup of tea would be swell, if that’s no trouble ma’am” replied Chinnery with the exaggerated courtesy of a seasoned expert.

As the kettle boiled, Chinnery and Mouse sat down in the living room while Summer slipped upstairs to lock her father’s study with a key from the set her parents has left. Although she had no immediate reason to distrust the reporter, it couldn’t hurt to be safe.

Once the tea was served, Summer joined the other two and began to summarise various elements of her father’s research and past work, taking care to skirt anything which might have been considered too sensitive. She especially avoided mentioning the contents of the blue dossier she had found shortly beforehand.

As she spoke, Chinnery listened and jotted a few notes on a small pad while Mouse shifted restlessly in her seat, still taking little interest in current events.

Chinnery maintained a relatively convincing air of professional curiosity throughout Summer’s makeshift expose, though Summer herself, ever perceptive, could tell his interest was beginning to wane. Although she had deliberately only stuck to information she suspected the reporter already knew, part of her itched to at least hint at the significance of what she had uncovered in the study. Chinnery’s earlier eagerness has stirred her pride and it wasn’t often Summer encountered an adult who was willing to take her so seriously.

As Chinnery was beginning to lower his notepad, her temptation won over and she blurted out “And I know his next book has something to do with the Omega Code but I’m not certain-“

“The what!?” Her guest’s eyes snapped upwards suddenly and his hands froze in their position of lowering the pad.

“The Omega Code” Summer repeated, taken aback by his sudden outburst. “I think it’s some kind of secret language which has something to do with the Cold War.” She questioned whether she was saying too much even as she spoke.

“I… see” Chinnery muttered softly, relaxing again in his seat, though Summer noted the hunger which had replaced the previous mild curiosity in her guest’s eyes. “Do you know any more about this Omega Code, Miss Salt? I’m sure our readers would be delighted to get the inside scoop on your father’s upcoming novel and it’s themes”

“I’m afraid that’s all I know” Summer tried to sound earnest.

“Surely you can give me a teeny bit more?” The reporter leaned forward pencil in hand, the hungry expression never leaving his eyes.

“I’m serious, I don’t know any more about this Omega Code thing” Summer tried again. From the corner, Mouse had been thoughtfully observing Chinnery’s newfound fascination in what her sister had to say.
“Are you sure? Is there any chance I could get a quick peek at some of your dad’s notes?”

“I’m afraid not - besides, I’m not sure where Dad keeps his notes” Summer lied defensively, already regretting her earlier revelation.

“I think you are!” Chinnery insisted. “C’mon, it’ll be our little secret and I might even be able to write you into my article as a co-author! Whad’ya say?”

“I’m sorry but Dad doesn’t let anyone near his work until it’s done. He doesn’t even let us see where he puts it”

At that second the phone started ringing and Summer excused herself with relief. It was her mother checking in from work, so Summer took the phone upstairs for privacy.

Chinnery finally seemed to accept defeat, sinking back into his seat and snapping his fingers in comical irritation. “Rats!”
113122.title: Invite him in (but do not tell him about the room)

1131221.content:
As the reporter sat back and cursed under his breath, Mouse casually spoke up. “Ya know, I’ll bet there’s a lot more information me and my sister could give you on Dad’s research”

Chinnery seemed to have forgotten Mouse was in the room and turned to her with renewed hope. “My apologies miss, I’d neglected to inquire-“

“I don’t know any more than Summer does” Mouse interrupted. “But that doesn’t necessarily mean we can’t help you find out more about this Omega Code thingy you’re so hung up on”

Chinnery looked confused. “Pardon me?”

“We happen to know where Daddy keeps all his important files” Mouse reminded him.

“Would you be willing to-“

“Nope” Mouse interrupted again.

Their guest looked at her pleadingly. “What would it take for you to change your mind? I’m sure there are a few potential arrangements we could-“

“That’s my Dad’s private research and there’s nothing you could offer that could possibly make me betray his trust” stated Mouse, with an air of innocent defiance. “But you might be able to persuade me or Summer to give up the location regardless” she added with barely concealed glee.

Chinnery gave her a perplexed stare. “My apologies miss but I don’t understand.”

“Well” Mouse began simply, crossing her legs and flexing her bare toes. “Me and my sister are extremely ticklish! If you were to, say, restrain and tickle us for a while, I’d bet you’d get us to tell you where to find Daddy’s papers” Mouse immediately covered her mouth in mock horror following her statement. “Oh no! Why did I say that? I hope I haven’t given you any ideas!” She squirmed in her chair in anticipation, though Chinnery made no move.

“What? I told you before, I’d never do anything like that!”

“Why not?” asked Mouse, her answer appearing to stun the reporter. “It’s the only way you’re going to get that story.”

“But I’m a reporter, not some medieval interrogator.” said Chinnery in indignation. “I can’t torture information out of people just for a story!”

“What do you mean ‘just for a story’?” asked Mouse in well rehearsed outrage. “Summer said this could be big didn’t she? And wouldn’t you say the people have a right to know about something like that?”

“Well, of course I would…” Chinnery admitted reluctantly. “But that doesn’t mean-“

“How far are you willing to go to get this stuff out to the public? You never thought being a reporter would be easy, did you? You took a solemn pledge to do all in your power to expose the truth. Didn’t you ever think you’d have to do more than just smile and ask questions to get to the truth?” Mouse added cheekily, as if to provoke him.

“You make a very good point miss, come to think about it” Chinnery conceded again, looking Mouse up and down with new perspective. “The public has a right to know and if you’re not willing to cooperate willingly, well, maybe more drastic measures are justified.” He shook his head and looked at her again baffled. “But surely it’d be easier just to tell me? There shouldn’t be a need to go that far. Be reasonable honey!”

“Like I said, there’s no way me or Summer could possibly hand over the location of his files. Those are private and you have no right to see them”

“Well then… I guess you leave me no choice.” said Chinnery in resignation as he stood up.

“I just hope you don’t use the duct tape in the drawer by the phone to tie me up!” Mouse said happily, her tone again taking Chinnery aback but he soon grinned and retrieved the silver roll of tape.

He wound several lengths of tape around both of Mouse’s wrists, securing them to the arms of the chair. He then knelt to tie her bare ankles together and also taped her knees. Finally, he wrapped the tape around her lower chest and the back of the chair, limiting her ability to buck and squirm. Mouse barely resisted throughout this interval, though she maintained her transparent facade of innocence with soft cries of “Oh no, what do you think you’re doing? You’d better untie me right now! There’s no way you’ll ever get me to reveal Daddy’s secret files!”

Once finished, Chinnery stood and took a moment to inspect his handiwork before…
1131221.title: Mouse encourages Chinnery to tickle the informa...

choices: Tied up in her living room
In an interrogation room in a foreign country
11313.content:
Two stood in the door: a tall and well-muscled middle-aged man who wore black and had a scar across the corner of his mouth; and a tall woman wearing high heels, sunglasses and a long raincoat.

"See?" said the woman. "I told you they were at home."

The man extended a beefy hand and grabbed Mouse by the collar of her shirt. In a second she was in his grasp with a hand over her mouth.

"Mmph, mmph!" Mouse said.

Not wasting a second, the two marched into the back of the building and into Dad's room, surprising Summer who barely looked up from her reading when the woman was already in front of her, and holding a chloroform laced tissue to her face. Summer opened her mouth, and fell asleep.

"Bring it all" commandeered the woman. "Bring the kids too. If they were reading it, then they will probably know something."

And so, barely an hour after being still at home and having a normal day, Summer came by to find herself...
11313.title: A pair of spies

113131.content:
Something soft and smooth caressed the sole of Summer's foot, drawing her out of her unconscious state. It began slowly, at her heels, slowly crawling up the length of her foot to the base of her toes, then back down again. She shifted uncomfortably and tried to pull away, but something held her legs fast. The sensation continued, slow and gentle, teasing her sensitive flesh. Her face split into a wide grin, and before she could control herself, a peal of girlish giggles erupted form her diaphragm. Whatever it was, it wasn't stopping. In fact, it only seemed to feed on her mirth, now flicking up and down the length of her soles, switching from one foot to the other at random. Summer squealed, unable to contain herself. Her body writhed against her control as her giggles escalated into full belly laughter. Her eyes bugged in surprise.

She was in the family living room. The room seemed darker than it should be, but she couldn't tell why. All she could focus on right now was her predicament. She sat upright on one end of the love seat, and someone had gone to great trouble to tie her up. Her wrists had been bound together, secured to another rope coiled around her chest, keeping her hands elevated and visible. Her legs had been tied together, just above the knees and at the ankles. The coffee table had been pushed up close to the small sofa's cushions, her legs stretched out across its surface, another rope securing her ankles down to the table's leg. Someone had removed her shoes and socks; she thought she could see them discarded haphazardly on the floor. Her big toes had been tied together with a bit of string, allowing her toes to curl, but preventing her feet to pull away from one another.

A woman knelt on the floor before her trapped feet, tormenting her soles with a white feather. It tickled her like crazy, like nothing she'd ever felt before, and she thrashed and struggled in vain to free herself or evade the feather's kiss. But this woman knew exactly what she was doing; a tiny, sadistic smirk had quirked up one corner of her mouth as she meticulously feathered the teenager's bare feet. Before long, Summer collapsed into the love seat, her muscles going limp with over-exertion.

"Hahahahahahaha--ohohohoho plehehehehease!" She begged, hoping the woman would show some mercy. "Stahahahahap!"

Surprisingly, she did stop, pulling the feather away. As her laughter faded into giggles, Summer puffed out a sign of relief. Her tummy fluttered with nervous butterflies. She had no idea what was going on. The last thing she remembered before blanking out was researching the Code that Dad's notes had gone over. She had been so close to cracking it...

She gasped audibly. The Code! That must be what this was all about. But before she could open her mouth to speak, she saw the woman lowering the feather again. Not towards Summer, however, but another, smaller pair of bare feet that had also been tied down atop the coffee table. Twisting her head, she saw Mouse seated next to her, tied up in an identical manner. She was still unconscious, but rapidly came to as the feather began stroking her soles. The younger sibling yelped and began squirming almost immediately. Summer felt pity for her little sister, but at the same time, was glad she wasn't the one being tickled anymore.

It took less than a minute for Mouse to crack. Very quickly the feather had gotten to her, eliciting peals of frantic laughter as her back arched and legs kicked helplessly.

"Nohohohohoho mohohohohohohore!" She begged, desperation ringing in her voice.

Again, the woman complied, pulling the feather away. She simply sat back and watched the girls, her baby blue eyes weighing and measuring them. She passed a hand through her honey-blonde hair, pushing it away from her eyes. Her rose-red lips curled into a wicked smile.

"You children are quite ticklish." The woman said. Summer recognized the undertone of an accent in her voice, but could not place it. "It would be a shame if I had to continue torturing you like this."

A chill ran down Summer's spine, making her shudder. Her toes curled unconsciously at the thought of enduring that feather's touch again. "W-what do you want?" She asked nervously.

The woman smiled. "Smart girl." She reached under the coffee table and slapped two things on the surface: Dad's folder containing his notes on the Code for his story, and Summer's notebook, which she'd been taking notes in while trying to decipher the Code. "These notes are incomplete." The woman said. "I need you to translate the code for us."

"Why should I?" Summer asked, trying to sound defiant and hoping her nervousness didn't show through.

"Because if you don't, you and your sister are in for the tickling of a lifetime." The woman said simply.

"No..." Mouse whimpered, shifting uncomfortably in her seat. "Summer, I don't know what's going on, but I don't think I can take another tickling like that. Just tell her what she wants. Please?"

Summer looked away from her sister. "I...can't, Mouse."

"But why not?!" She insisted, desperation in her voice again.

"Because that Code Dad's been working on is very important. I don't know who this woman is, but if she gets her hands on it she can decipher top secret documents used by the US government. Or the Russian government." Summer tried to shoot the woman a defiant glare. "I don't know who you think you are, but I don't think anyone willing to break into houses and torture children should have that kind of power. I won't help you. Final answer."

"It's a shame, really." The woman said, giving a faux sigh. She turned her head to someone else, a large man standing near the picture window facing out into the front yard. "Keep an eye out for the mother's return. If the girls don't talk, perhaps we can persuade Mommy to give us what we want." She turned back, flashing Summer with an evil smile. "Perhaps their ticklishness is inherited."

The man didn't say anything, only nodded and continued watching out the window through a crack in the curtains. Summer now understood why the room was so dark. The curtains had been drawn just enough to leave that crack for the man to watch through.

"Now then," the woman purred, wafting the feather in the air for Summer and Mouse to see. "Who should I start with?"

Summer felt nauseated and questioned whether or not she'd made the right call. She couldn't stand being tickled! And she knew Mouse was going to pay for her defiance. Mouse whimpered pitifully, and Summer saw her trying to back into the couch cushions despite the ropes. Their eyes met, and Summer hoped hers didn't look nearly as wide-eyed with fear as her sister's. "It'll be okay, Mouse." She tried to reassure her. "Someone will come for us. I'm sure of it." She almost believed it herself. Almost.

"How touching." The woman said. "I think I'll start with..."
113131.title: The Interrogation Begins

choices: Summer is tickled with an electric toothbrush on each foot.
1131311.content:
The woman approached Summer.

"Are you gonna talk or do I have to tickle you till you go mad with laughter?" she asked the trapped girl.

"I'll never talk you hear me? NEVER" Summer replied.

"Oh well. Have it your way" she said as she bought a bottle out of her bag.

"Oh no. Not baby oil. Don't you dare" said Summer.

"Silence. You had your chance brat. Now you suffer" said the woman as she started rubbing the oil into Summer's feet.

"WOOOOOOOHOHOHOHOHOOOOO. NONONOOOOOOOOOHOHOHOHOHOOOO. STAAAAAAAAP I'M BEEEEEEEEEEHEHEHEHEHEEEEEGGING YOU. OH NO NOT MY TOOOOOOOOOOOHOHOHOHOHOOOES. IT'S TORTURE. AAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAAAAA" the tied up girl howled

Just then...
1131311.title: "...the older sister."  (Summer)

choices: Tickle Summer (her feet are too cute to resist)
Get tickled with Summer (I can't tickle her for information, only fun)
Run to go get help (this is more than I can handle)
11313111.content:
"You have one final chance to talk before I tickle you senseless. Better talk, Softsoles" the woman said.

"How many times do I have to say it? NO. YOU ARE NOT GETTING ANY INFORMATION FROM ME" said Summer.

"Have it your way. I'm sure you'll change your tune in about an hour. And if not, we still have your little sister" the woman said.

"HEY. YOU STAY AWAY FROM MOUSE YOU EVIL WOMAN. YOU EVEN TOUCH HER AND YOU'LL BE SORRY" yelled Summer.

"Oh just shut up and laugh brat" said the woman as she approached Summer's bare feet with a scrubbing brush.

Just then Summer hears a familiar voice.

"Hey Summer. You coming out to...wha...what's going on in here?"

"CHRIS" Mouse exclaimed as if a favourite uncle had just entered the room.

"Save me Chris. This evil woman is gonna tickle me on my feet till I lose my mind" cried Summer.

"GET AWAY FROM HER YOU CREEP. NO ONE TICKLES THOSE CUTE FEET EXCEPT FOR ME" yelled Chris.

"Well Kid. I guess ya got two options. Tickle her feet, or get tickled with her. C'mon Chris, those cute little feet of hers are all oiled up and ready to go. And they're just begging you to tickle em" said the woman.

Chris decides to...
11313111.title: Chris comes in

choices: Tickle Mouse. Even if she knows nothing, it will torture Summer to hear it.
Bring in a pair of goats to lick Summer's feet, tickling her crazy
Remove Summer's shirt to expose and tickle her upper body.
11313113.content:
"Oh, you think the oil tickled? Just wait until you feel THESE on your helpless little tootsies. I'll have you BEGGING to translate that code for me" said the woman as she activated 2 electric toothbrushes.

"NOOOOOOOOO, PLEASE NOT ELECTRIC TOOTHBRUSHES. PLEEEEEEEEEEHEHEHEHEHEHEEEEEEEEASE SHOW SOME MERCY. WAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAAAAAAAAA, NO MOOOOOOOHOHOHOHOHOOOOOOOORE. I'M BEEEEEEEEEEHEHEHEHEHEEEEEEEEEEGGING YOU, SHUT EM OOOOOOOOOOHOHOHOHOHOOOOOFF" Summer screamed.

Mouse could only sit there and listen as her big sister was tortured. She wished she could do something, but didn't want the lady to get her instead.

Just then, Summer's torment hit a new high.

"EYAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAAAAAAAAAAAAA. NAAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAAAAAAT MY TOOOOOOOHOHOHOHOHOOOOOES. TAKE THE BRUSHES AWAAAAAÀHAHAHAHAHAAAY, I CAN'T STAAAAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAAAAAND IT" shrieked Summer.

"Are you going to translate the code?" asked the lady.

"I'LL NEVER TRANSLATE IT, NEEEEEEEEEEEEEEHEHEHEHEHEEEEEEVER" shrieked Summer.

Mouse curled her own bare toes. Summer sounded like she was getting the worst tickling of her life.

"Try THIS on for size" said the lady as she slid the brushes between Summer's ties, which provided instant results.

"OOOOOHWAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAAAAAAAAA. THATS EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEHEHEHEHEHEEEEEEEEEEVIL. PLEASE, STAAAAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAAAAAAAP TICKLING MY FEEEEEEEEHEHEHEHEHEEEEET" shrieked Summer as she began to thrash in the restraints.

the lady decided it was time to give summer a short break.

"UFF UFF UFF UFF. DO YOU FINALLY SEE...THAT I'M NOT GONNA TALK? THE TRANSLATION OF THAT CODE LIVES AND DIES WITH ME...AND I'LL NEVER TELL YOU" cried Summer as she tried to get her breath back.

"Oh, I may not have the translation of that code YET. But I WILL get it, I just need a different approach" said the lady.

With that, she decided to...
11313113.title: Summer is tickled with an electric toothbrush o...

choices: The same electric toothbrushes she used to tickle Summer
113131131.content:
"Hmm...maybe your little sister knows how to translate it" said the lady.

the lady sighed "Very well, I'll get my tools to torture your sister until your ready to talk" she said

1131311311.title: The same electric toothbrushes she used to tick...

11313113111.content:
Raising one eyebrow the woman glanced over to Summer while the tickle torture of the little toes continued. She had to keep herself from smiling. The older sister looked outright shocked. Her feet wiggled in sympathy. Summer's mouth opened but nothing came out. The code needed to be protected at all cost. She need more time to think. The mean adults were already on the wrong path by tickling Mouse, providing the cute little detective with time to think. Mouse would need to hold on. How could they be so mean to her little sister?

Meanwhile Mouse howled and squealed, alternating pitch at the same time when the electric toothbrush changed position between her tooes and at the center of her soles. "SUUUUUUUUUUMMER TEELLLL HER!" she begged. But Summer only shook her head and looked towards the ceiling. She would delay conversation as long as possible. "Do you have no sympathy for your sister?" the women said to Summer when she gave Mouse a brief pause? The little girl was panting heavily and moaned "No more please. I..." but her flow or words was stopped by sharp fingernails resting on her soles. "Shut up. Only your big sister is allowed to talk." Mouse bit her lip. Talking, rather begging, was her favorite habit when she was in trouble.

"You like when your sister gets tickle tortured. Isn't that right Summer?" The woman rose to her feet. She was standing in front of two adjacent pairs of tied up feet. Her words were not answered. Summer gulped instead. 'THINK HARD' she shouted to herself. 'What time is it? When would her parents come back? Would any friends come over and knock at her door?' She pulled hard at her bonds but they did not give in. "Why don't you answer?" the woman cooed, her fingers stroking Summer's arches. It tickled but also felt kind of nice, almost caring. Mouse could not stand the silence but did not want to draw attention. Would her sister really....? She shuddered at the thought. Summer grinned and shook her head. Neither the woman nor Mouse understood whether that was an answer or whether it was just caused by the casual tickling.

"Well,, next round." The woman reached behind her and picked up a large hairbrush with mean looking stiff bristles. Both girls screamed "NO!" at the same instant. Summer felt her ankle grabbed and tensed. The tickle attack from the bristles on her unprotected soles was causing a ticklish agony that blocked any way of thinking. Her whole body screamed in protest. After an eternity, which was rather a few seconds only, the bristles left her soles which tingled. Summer could not remember what she had screamed. "Two minutes of this for your sister now! Think how unbeareable ten seconds were for you. Last chance. The code?"

Mouse begged and pleaded. She even offered to clean the house, wash the car, something she usually despised. Summer's mind raced. Two minutes would drive her sister mad. What now?

- Tell a false code
- Refuse again
11313113111.title: Summer Refused, Earning Mouse The Hairbrush Tre...

choices: The sisters' slow descent to hell begins...
113131131111.content:
"Sorry, no."
"Alright then" the women said cheerfully and Mouse's two minute scrubbing brush mayhem began.
Mouse wailed like a baby and immediately started begging the woman when she stopped.

"Please...Please ma'am, I'll give you my secret doll collection just stop tickling meeee and my feeeeeeeet!"
The woman only took a moment to glance sideways at Summer before she said
"No? Alright then." and lifted the hairbrush again. Mousescrunched her soles madly.

"Please, Summer, stop her!" Mouse started crying, and then Summer broke.

"FINE! I'll tell you the code! Are you happy now?"

The woman smirked. "Not yet; not until I know you're telling the truth. Bernard, keep our guest entertained while I do business."
The larger man started massaging Mouse's feet with his big palms. Her feet were so tingly from the burhing just now even this tickled her.
Hu ha ha even your hands tickle now" Mouse complained

"What, stop this and promise me you won't hurt her anymore" Summer demanded.

"It's all the more motivation for you to translate this code quickly. If we got what we came from we shall leave. For your sake you should hurry.
You see, when Bernard gets bored he can get real nasty with a feather."

Summer gulped, she was led back in her father's room and sat down at the table with the computer.
"Okay, so this code...and the secret document...It actually has a simple system..."
She tried to explain what she came up with but worked up the courage to slip in some errors that she thought were still believable but hopefully enough to make the rest useless

"Hmm, I don't see how that would make sense" the woman said. "I want you to translate the entire page, and hurry up, Bernard must be worried by now."
Summer gulped. I hope you're not doing anything to you Mouse. She read out loud a translation wth the liberties she had slipped in.

"Ah! yes. Now I understand. Understand that you're a filthy LIAR!" the woman screamed.

"What, but-but-, I translated that text word to word!"

"Imbecile! Just how naive do you think us to be? This isn't a map! Do you really think we don't know what's supposed to be in the text? If it's right it should give us the coordinates to a top secret location. You've only given me some garbled text!"

"No, wait, there must be a mistake, if you just let me try again..."

"What, so that you can give us more lies? It seems like you still don't understand who you're dealing with."

Shedragged Summer back in the room and nodded to her partner. "Prepare the little sister."

The sisters were thrown onto a bed and got their feet and hands tied to the two ends with rope.

Mouse turned her head towards her sister in panic.

"Summer...You told them the code right? Summer? SUMMER I HATE YUHUHUHUUUU"

Her begging questions came frantic as blindfolds and babyoil were applied in quick succession
Finally a mouth gag for each to shut both sisters up.

The woman was cackling maniacally looking pleased as she stared down at the blind burritos mmphing and wiggling their captive toes

"I'm just terrified of myself right now."

Keep it up on this one, we're getting somewhere
1131313.content:
Summer gulped and tried to hold her breath in, but feeling glad that for the moment she was the only one being targeted.
That meant that she could stop worrying about Mouse at least, and remind herself that she was doing the brave thing, so she was feeling kinda strong.

The woman slid the feather over her soles a few more times but seeing Summer's still happy (though sweating) face seemed to annoy her enough that she decided to change her tactics.

"Hmm, maybe if this isn't getting through to you fast enough. I think...
I'll let you guys have a few rounds with my partner Bernard."

She signaled for the large man to step closer. The feather was taken over and he waved it a few times with a broad grin.

The woman stepped back, smiled evilly and folded her arms
"I'm warning you girls - Bernard shows no mercy. If you want to get out of this now, I would if I were you. He always gets his answers. It's not even two months ago that he had a pair of girls just like you like this, and they sang like birds
once they tried out what he could do with just one feather, like that one."

"Oh don't worry Victoria" the man licked his lips. "A minute and they'll be BEGGING to have you back instead and to be allowed to tell me all of their secrets."

It's okay Summer, she thought, it's just some tickling.
What could be so bad about this Bernard, he's...

"WHATWHAT WHAT" she yelled out in surprise as the hard end of the feather started by hitting her pressure points.
The same feather was producing all kinds of new motions.
It felt good but it kinda tickled!

"Ehehe!" Summer giggled and blushed.

"Looks like you like this, how about this then."
The feather changed to teasing tickles all over the side.
The feather's tip was following the shape of the foot perfectly, caressing it like a long-lost friend never again leaving its side.
"NNNGH. Waiiit...heehnng" (smile)
She threw her head back and did not laugh.

"How about..."
He reached over and tried to squeeze her thighs.
"Wo-hoo-hoo! Ho-hoo!" Summer grinned and kicked.

"Victoria, help me out with this girl."
Summer bit her lips when an arm was forced over her head, and the man's partner dug her nails into her underarms.
"Hey no touchy." she begged. The woman raked her fingers over her supple skin.

"So, are you gonna tell us?"
Summer adjusted her position.
"No."
"Not gonna tell us huh.
Okay...
See how you like it when I go right under the toes."
Summer flinched hard when the base of her toes was touched.
"Ah! No! xD" She shut her eyes and shook her head to try to hold back the giggles.

Despite the situation, she was having a bit of fun. Holding back information from evil villains, this is what it all was about.

And she wouldn't admit it, but her feet liked the attention. The tickling wasn't so bad yet, and it was strange and thrilling to find out just what some nerves on her feet could do.

"Mmmgh. Couldn't you just massage them?" she sighed, trying not to buck too much when her sides, lower legs and toes were squeezed some more.

"Honey, you misunderstand us. This isn't a fun session, this is a questioning session."

Still displeased, the woman told her partner
"Bernard, continue. I'm going to go find something that can really tickle this girl."
"My pleasure."

The woman left the room and Summer sighed in relief, maybe with just one crook around she could finally think of an escape plan.

However just then, by pure accident, the feather found the soft part of her arches. It took all her reflexes to not to suddenly burst out roaring, but the sudden jump, "pff" and swollen cheeks were unmistakable.
Bernard tried it again.
"Ooh momm-"
...and again...and again...
"snkt snkt snkt Eeeeeeheheh eee!"
Bernard tried out a small toothbrush. Summer began bucking.
"Ooh yeah!" the older crook said as Summer's sole curled and uncurled and the little girl was jumping on her seat.

"So, you gonna tell us now?" he asked.
"Eeehehahahyah no."

"It's your funeral little girl! Come on! Just give it to us! Don't make us tickle your sister!"
"Noplease"
1131313.title: Bound to break

choices: Pretend to suddenly become less ticklish
Ask him if he shouldn't find his partner
11313132.content:
The feather was harsh on Summer; she was trying to get "tickled in", warmed up to the point where her feet'd start to get more sensitive to the point where she'd lose all self-control. If she wanted the tiniest chance of escape she had to keep the criminal from finding this out.

Summer's ticklishness varied with her mood. And right now, owing to regular sleep, calmness of knowing she'd do the right thing, the thrill of discovery from earlier, a comfortable chair, relative feeling of safety of home and other factors, this wasn't too bad. But she knew her mood could change easily at any time and turn this helpless girl into a screaming mess. The important thing was not to panic, but it was always hard to focus on that in the throes of tickle-torture.

His tormentor realized that too, because he was focused on testing out new methods on her legs and feet, amazed by the different reactions he got each time. When he was bulling the balls of the feet, Summer's voice hit high pitches; when she went down onto the heel, she was shaking and cursing with a deep laugh. When you moved the feather along the sides, she was singing and jump so much she might break out of the restraints; yet when you hit the points on her arch in the right order she became tame and purred like a kitten. It was certainly a fun thing to watch, and each new method would reveal more; it was shocking that such a variety of reactions could come from the same girl. He hoped Victoria'd be back soon, he couldn't wait to try out what a new tool would achieve on this person.

Summer, bravely holding on, was kept worried by other thoughts. If the ropes could gave way by now they would have. It didn't seem like she'd get out of there without outside help. Just getting the pair to leave wouldn't be enough, she had to convince them to release them, somehow. And she had to keep this sicko away from Mouse.
11313132.title: Keep this up, we're getting somewhere

"Ahaha! Wo-ho-ho-HOO! EEK!
Ghahaha
Ghuhuhahahaw.
Weehehehoohoo.
Wehehaha (scream)
Ehe. Ehe. Ehe. C'mon.

NOWHY! I HATE IT COMEOON!"

"Bwahaha!
AAAAAAAHH!"
