He looked rather impressed with all the noises the older sister was producing.
When Summer jumped after just a poke on the heel, he had to cover his mouth to not to laugh out.

"Wow, your sister is the most ticklish 'lee I have ever seen." she remarked to Mouse.
"Look at what I'm making her do with barely a touch."

Mouse looked pouty, but Summer didn't pay attention; her plan was working!

"So, are you ready to talk?"
"Please, if you can see that I'm going crazy then will you finally believe that I don't know?"
"Hmm. I may, but first..."
113131321.title: Pretend more ticklishness

choices: Will see how you like HER helping out.
Taking you both to a different location.
1131313212.content:
Bernard moved to Summer's upper body, testing out the armpits and the sides, and the face and the neck. It took a lot of willpower for Summer not to give away her spots. She blessed herself for that trick before that allowed her to hang on to her sanity for longer without giving her resistance away, otherwise she'd have been in a hopeless situation now.

She tried to give off the right pretend-giggles while bracing herself whenever the feather brushed over her weak spots.

Mouse, who was watching all this silently, suddenly spoke up.
"Try it on the ribs, she's super ticklish there."
"The nape of her neck is also a weak spot."
"She can never stand it when I tickle with a feather on the ears or the nose."

"Mouse!" Summer cried out in surprise. "Stop telling him about my spots."

"I can't do that, Summer. This is a battle between sisters.
"What? What battle?"
"Obviously, for the title of person most ticklish."

Summer ran the last 15 minutes backwards in her mind in confusion and settled on the time when the tickler said "your sister is the best 'lee ever". She practically forgot it by now but not Mouse, apparently.

"Mouse, our lives are on the line and you care about THAT?"

"This is a matter of pride. C'mon Mr. Torturer...Do my feet too please." She stretched her soles with a determined expression.

Summer was seriously flabbergasted seeing her sister's idiocy.

"Mouse you're seriously the dumbest, stupidest..."
"Are you insulting me? Cuz I can still tell him about that sweet spot between your toes you know."

The older man was looking at them in confusion
"I'm sorry...Are you two fighting? Now?"
"What does it look like, dumbass." Summer mumbled.

But the man called Bernard suddenly got angry.

"Hey! Are you making fun of me? You ARE making fun of me.
You two are probably not even ticklish!"

Summer's jaw dropped. Oh thank be to you, god of dumbasses and Mouse, because your idiocy may just have saved our butts again.

"That's right." she blurted out, trying to look firm. "What are you gonna do about it?"

The criminal's brow furrowed. He picked up his phone.
"I'm calling my partner. We..."
1131313212.title: Betrayed by Mouse.

11313132121.content:
They heard a car engine from outside as it drove off.
Left alone sitting in the dark room Summer turned to her sister.
"I can't free myself. Can you?"

It took them about an hour to wiggle free
Summer sent a whining Mouse (complaining non-stop about aching feet) to her room, and went back to her father's study to think.
She previously shot down Mouse's suggestion to call the police; she didn't want anyone to ask awkward questions and interfere until she had the time to think about this.

The dossier was gone. So were most of his father's papers. Some of them were torn up or burned. She didn't bother with those; if the two spies did not find anything in them, she doubted they were important.

So what did that leave her with?

The mystery of the code would be impossible to complete now, but that didn't matter.
Right now, what she needed was some way to find who those two were.

Then - she realized!
She climbed under the table to drag out an old cardboard box.
The Early Draft box. She saw her father throw enough papers into it while she was sitting here to know what it was for.

Dad was a voracious note-taker with a labyrinth of a memory both absent-minded and genius.
He'd often make a copy about the things he wrote down, which got discarded once he made a new version or which he simply forgot about. Pages for his new book, scribbles, research notes, calls for action to humankind, letters...It was a long shot but just maybe...

She emptied the entire box on the floor, surveyed each page one by one, and finally snatched up something that looked like it could be her Holy Grail.
It was an envelope, scribbled on several times but the address and the subject line were still visible.
She opened it.

"Dear Madam and Respected Sir, " she read. "

I am turning to you as the author of the critically acclaimed "Undercover Hearts (and Bullets)" books (complimentary copy attached). My good friend Mr. [unreadable] recommended that I speak to you, calling you an expert on these things.
My address is..."

She flipped the page over and there it was. An address and a phone number.

She ran to her computer (more complaints shouted from Mouse's room ignored). Indeed, there it was, a real address and not even too far either.
Mr. Swanson and Mrs. Swanson, occupation: teacher, occupation: doctor...

She picked up the phone and dialed the number.

It rang six times until somebody picked it up.

"Who is this." said a younger female voice.
"Err I was looking for a Mr. or Mrs. Swanson."
"Mom and dad can't come to the phone right now. Who's talking?"
"Err my name is Summer Salt, and I need to ask them about a very important case...and you are...?"
"Oh right. This..."
She paused.
"This is Katelyn"
11313132121.title: Finally free, and on the trail

choices: Ambushed in our home by two spies.
113131321211.content:
It only took an hour by bus. The home of the Swansons was in the neighboring town but so close in the end it was almost surprising. It kinda made Summer suspicious of her Dad - if he didn't really need to go that far on his research trips, then what had they all been for?

"Remember Mouse, look friendly" she hissed to the younger sister.

A girl in a green shirt opened the door.

"So. You're Summer and...Mouse?" She raised an eyebrow

"Long story." Summer said, and sighed in relief.

---
- No, I'm not a reporter or police! I'm just calling trying to find a friend of my father...No, I'm not lying!
No, I'm...Please don't put it down! Please, I promise you, I won't bother you...Yes I understand you don't want to get involved in anything...Just...Could you maybe give the phone to your dad...
- Dad doesn't talk to anybody he doesn't know or who would be calling him on this phone. Bye.
- Please! Please! Okay, just one more thing. Do you know anyone called...Victoria?

There was silence on the other end.

- Victoria?
- Yeah, and the man's name, I think, was Bernard.
- Are you one of them?
- Are you one of...who?
- Oh. Well, then...nothing.
- Wait!
Summer said, desperate not to let the phone to be put down.
- Look, I-.. I'm a hobby detective. OK, I'm still in training, and...
I don't know what happened to you, but...Maybe I could...help you...?"

There was almost half a minute of silence

- Okay.
---
And now there they were all piled into the Swansons' living room. The Salts had a nice multistorey family home but the Swansons' flat looked even more luxurious, the ceiling in the living room was as high as Summer's room would be in their own house.

Katelyn and Vanessa looked friendly enough, and the three immediately found a common topic.

"Tickling is like, literally the worst thing you can do to a person."

"Right?" Summer smiled happily at this unexpected sympathy.

Mouse was dangling her feet. She must be feeling shy around new people, Summer thought, or she'd have surely interrupted just now.

"It was horrible." Vanessa sighed. "My little feet are still tingly."

Summer looked at them left and right.
"So...What happened?"
The two sisters looked at each other, both expecting the other to speak first.
"Well" Vanessa finally began. "It all started about a month ago, on a day when we were..."
113131321211.title: The OTHER sisters. (compliments to MangoCherry)

1131313212112.content:
by Ishimura42
(reposted from an interactive by MangoCherry and Ishimura42 that was since erased)

Katelyn and Vanessa were relaxing at ome thinking about something to do.
Katelyn sighed at her sister. "I'm gonna go to my room. I guess there's a lot of magazines I can read." Katelyn then walked upsrairs to her bedroom and layed down on her bed, then took out a magazine and read away. Vanessa sat on the couch and thought of something to do.

All of a sudden, the doorbell rang. She walked to the door and looked through the peephole. no one was there. "Freakin' Ding-Dong-Ditchers..." She started walking back to the couch until the door rang again. She walked to the door with a frown.

"Who is it?" Katelyn's voice came from behind. She was standing at the base of the stairs, looking in through the kitchen at the front door of their house.

"Not sure." Vanessa shrugged. "I looked out the peephole the first time the bell rang, but nobody was there."

"Freakin' ding-dong-ditchers." Katelyn sighed, walking briskly towards the door.

"My thoughts exactly." Her sister beamed.

When the elder sister reached the door, she peered through the peephole. Just as Vanessa said, nobody was standing there.

"See anything?" Vanessa asked.

"Nothing. Just some kids messing with us." She smiled deviously over her shoulder at Vanessa. "If it happens again, I'll tell 'em off." This made Vanessa giggle. Though their parents disapproved of it, Katelyn could curse like a sailor when she wanted to. Both girls turned away from the door and headed towards the living room.

No sooner had they passed the threshold of the kitchen, however, the doorbell rang again. Katelyn pivoted quickly and sprinted for the door, her feet pounding on the kitchen's linoleum floor. She threw open the door and looked around. There were no signs of anyone having been there. Katelyn started shouting. "Alright you little...!" Profane words and threats of unpleasant consequences spilled out of her mouth at an alarming rate as she berated the ding-dong-ditchers to the whole neighborhood. Vanessa stood in the kitchen, practically holding her sides with laughter. When she felt satisfied that she'd gotten her point across, Katelyn slammed the door closed, then proceeded to smile warmly at her little sister and give a satisfactory nod. "That should do it." She said proudly. Vanessa was still giggling.

The girls again left for the living room, and neither one was really all that surprised when the doorbell didn't ring again.

Both girls, however, were surprised when they entered the living room. A middle-aged man, both tall and well-muscled, was crouched on the floor in the middle of the room. He wore all black clothing, and was rifling through a black duffle bag. When the girls stood frozen in shock, the man looked up and gave them a sinister smile. "Mornin'!"

"Who are you?" Katelyn asked, wide-eyed with surprise.

"I'm acquainted with your folks." Something in his voice made Katelyn think that the man was being less than truthful. She could feel a small bubble of fear forming in the pit of her stomach. Her eyes darted nervously around the room.

"How did you...?"

"Back door." He responded before she could even finish the question.

"What do you...?"

"I'm looking for something that belongs to your parents. Something you lovely ladies are going to help me find."

Katelyn heard a fearful whimper from Vanessa, and instinctively stood in front of her little sister. She swallowed before speaking again, not sure she wanted to hear the answer to her next question. "And if we refuse?"

The man's grin widened. "Well...let's just say I have ways of convincing you to help me." His hand reached for the duffle bag.

Not wanting to find out what the man was grabbing, Katelyn quickly grabbed Vanessa's wrist and turned around, intending to run back through the kitchen and out the front door. Her plan was ruined, however, when she found a woman standing in the kitchen doorway, blocking the sisters' way through.

"Hello, girls." The woman said, her smile just as sinister as the man's. "Looking to run off, are you?"

Not stopping to answer, the girls scrambled toward the stairs. Katelyn hoped to find some measure of escape if she could lock them in one of the bedrooms upstairs.
1131313212112.title: Ambushed in our home by two spies. (K&V's story)

11313132121121.content:
by Ishimura42

Halfway up the stairs, Vanessa's hand suddenly slipped out of Katelyn's. The younger sister started to scream but the sound was quickly muffled. Katelyn stopped and turned to see her sister being held securely in the man's arms, one of his hands holding a cloth over her mouth and nose.

"Vanessa!" Katelyn yelled. Not thinking about her self, she launched herself back down the stairs, intending to attack the man and free her sister. Once off the bottom stair, however, she felt the woman's hands grip her shoulder's firmly, halting her progress. "Let go of me!"

"Just settle down, dear." She heard the woman's voice behind her. "We don't want all this ruckus."

"Let go of my sister, you creep!" Even as the words left her mouth, Katelyn saw Vanessa's eyes droop, and her body went limp. "Vanessa! What did you do to her?"

"Don't worry, she's just sleeping." The man said, gently laying the unconscious Vanessa down on the ground. "Just like you will be soon."

Katelyn felt the woman's grip on her tighten. Though she thrashed with all of her strength to get free, she couldn't. Her eyes widened with fear when she saw the man stand up, and moved the cloth that had knocked out Vanessa toward her own face.

"No! Don't! Get that away from me!" She screamed. He cries were muffled as the cloth covered her nose and mouth. Within moments, she felt lightheaded. Her muscles started going slack, and her thrashing became less violent. Before she knew what to do, she was out cold.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Katelyn regained consciousness some time later. She opened her eyes wearily, and found herself staring at the living room ceiling. Her limbs felt heavy, and as she went to stretch them, she found they wouldn't move at all. Her grogginess faded quickly as her attention focused on her lack of mobility. Picking her head up, she took in her predicament; and was horrified.

The living room couch had three segments, and the two end segments were built like reclining chairs. The backs tipped back, and a footrest popped out of the base. However, these particular recliners were motorized, not mechanical. There was no lever to pull, only a button that slowly reclined the seat and raised up the footrest. No amount of pressure could force the seat back into it's "standard" position. The entire recline/un-recline processes depended on that button.

Katelyn found herself sitting on one such end of the couch, with the seat fully reclined. The back was tilted halfway down toward a laying-down position, and the footrest was all the way up, bringing her legs straight out in front of her. Her legs were tied together at the ankles and knees, with additional cords of rope securing those joints to the footrest, and preventing her from moving her legs much. More rope was used to secure her waist to the back of her seat. Her arms were also tied together, at the wrists and elbows, and stretched over her head. A length of rope tied around the loop holding her wrists together disappeared over the top of the couch. She assumed it had been tied off to one of the couch's legs, because she couldn't pull her arms forward in the least. She struggled against her bonds, testing them. Though she found that the ropes had been tied securely enough to keep her from moving all that much, they weren't tied tightly enough to cause pain or cut off circulation. In fact, the rope seemed rather soft and smooth against her skin.

"Katelyn?" She heard Vanessa's voice off to her left. Turning her head and struggling to look over the back of the couch's middle segment, she found Vanessa, tied up in the exact same manner she was, on the other end segment of the couch. Vanessa's eyes were wide with fear.

"Vanessa! Are you okay?"

"I can't move." Vanessa's voice trembled. "I'm scared."

"I can't either." Katelyn tried to make her voice sound reassuring, but wasn't sure it worked. "But don't be scared. We're going to be fine." She wished she could believe that, taking their situation into account.

Just then, the pair of intruders walked into the room. Making sure to stand where both girls could see her, the woman smiled cheerily at them. "Well, I'm glad to see you're both awake."

The girls made demanding questions in unison. "What do you want?!" Katelyn asked as Vanessa inquired "Why are we tied up?!"

"Patience, children." The woman made a soothing gesture with her hand. "Listen to what I have to say, and you'll understand why we're here."
11313132121121.title: Both sisters get captured!

113131321211211.content:
by Ishimura42

Katelyn and Vanessa sat in silence, waiting for the woman to proceed with her explanation.

The woman cleared her throat. "My name is Victoria. My associate over there," she waved a hand in the man's direction, "is Bernard. While this may be hard to believe, your parents work for the United States government. More specifically, they're international spies, working to gather information relating to national security and foreign threats."

"Spies?" Vanessa's tone was one of disbelief.

"That's preposterous!" Katelyn demanded. "Our father is a teacher, and our mother is a doctor! The idea of them being spies is ridiculous!"

"And yet they do seem to take a lot of vacations, don't they?" Victoria smirked. Katelyn stopped to think about that. It was true, now that she thought about it. Their parents did go on vacation fairly often...at least once a season, as far as her memory could tell. Sometimes they'd be gone for a weekend, as was the case now. Other times they'd be gone for a whole week. It was just something she'd never thought to question before.

"I'm not saying that I believe you," Katelyn began, "but supposing our parents were spies, like you claim...that still doesn't explain why you're here."

"Or why you have us tied up like this." Vanessa added.

"Well, girls," Bernard stepped forward to take over the discussion. "Victoria and I are freelance spies. We take jobs for whoever has the money to pay. And right now, we're being paid to find a vault your parents have hidden somewhere in this house."

"Our employer has reason to believe that this vault contains some top-secret files that contain information he would rather stay out of government hands." Victoria said.

"Now I know you're joking." Katelyn sighed. "Why on earth would the government allow its employees to keep top-secret files hidden in their homes? Such sensitive information would surely be kept under high security at the Pentagon or some other government building."

"Smart girl." Victoria smiled. "And while you are right on the money with that fact, there are exceptions to that. Especially when the government suspects that this information in danger."

"In danger from what?" Vanessa sounded irritated.

"In danger from being stolen, of course. Or, worse yet, destroyed. There's an ongoing investigation trying to root out a mole in your parents' division. They suspect somebody inside is leaking information to foreign leaders. And so, the more trusted associates, like your parents, keep their files hidden at home, and off the record. At least, until the infiltrator is found."

"Well, I hate to ruin it for you guys, but I don't know anything about any vault of secret information." Katelyn said.

"Neither do I." Vanessa added. "Can you untie us now, please? My arms are uncomfortable."

"While that might be so, please forgive us if we don't take your word for it." Bernard said.

"And even if that is the truth, there is more that you could provide us with."

"Like what?" Katelyn asked. Her voice dripped with sarcasm. The absurdity of the situation was getting on her nerves.

"Your parents," Victoria said, "despite their career, are very tender-hearted people, who love their daughters very much." Katelyn's heart sank into her stomach. She wasn't sure she liked where this was going. "Even if we find the vault we're looking for, it's sure to be safeguarded by some sort of lock."

"The most common types of locks on this sort of vault," Bernard pitched in, "are numeric keypads. They require that a certain sequence of numbers is entered in before the lock opens. It's not uncommon for there to even be multiple numeric sequences before the lock opens."

"In short," Victoria chimed in, "We believe that the vault is locked by two numeric codes; and each of you girls holds one of the codes. Whether you realize it or not."

Vanessa gasped, but Katelyn just rolled her eyes. "This is insane." She said. "Your story makes no sense, I'd almost prefer it if you'd have just robbed us. I don't know anything about any hidden vault. And I certainly don't remember my parents giving me any sort of numeric code." Vanessa nodded in agreement.

"Well then, I guess we're just going to have to jog your memory. On both accounts." Victory smiled evilly at the sisters. Vanessa gulped, and even Katelyn was starting to have second thoughts.

"And...how do you plan to do that?" Katelyn asked.

"We've had to do all sorts of interrogations before, in our line of work." Bernard said, crouching down to dig through the duffle bag he had brought with him. "Oftentimes, we have to use pain as a motivator." Vanessa whimpered and started testing the ropes holding her. Katelyn just sat in silence, dread growing in the pit of her stomach. "But many times, our victims have been trained to endure pain, and they can resist our methods."

"So, we developed a new method." Victoria said cheerily. "It doesn't cause any lasting pain, and doesn't leave any marks on the victims. If performed correctly, the victims can even endure this method for very extended periods of time. And I am happy to announce that all of our interrogations have been successful ever since we've started employing this method of torture."

Both girls were shifting uncomfortably now. Their imaginations were running wild, trying to figure out this horrible torture before it was revealed to them. Neither of them wanted to ask the question, but Katelyn finally stirred up the resolve. "So...what are you going to do to us?"

Bernard smiled evilly and withdrew his hand from the duffle bag. Held lightly between his fingertips was a long, white feather with a stiff quill. He held it up for the girls to see, and waved it gently through the air.

"We're going to tickle you." Victoria said, almost mockingly.

The sisters' eyes widened when they saw the feather, and both of them started struggling against the ropes holding them down at the word "tickle." Both girls were exceedingly ticklish. Vanessa shuddered, remembering a time that her friends had gang-tickled her. It had been horrible. One girl held down Vanessa's arms, while another held down her legs, and a boy spent 15 minutes tickling her all over, trying to find her worst spots. She remembered squealing the most when her tummy and bellybutton had been tickled, and she practically screamed when the boy had squeezed her knees. But the absolute worst had been when the boy removed her socks and used a ball-point pen to doodle on her bare feet. Those sensations made her scream with ticklish agony. Similar thoughts ran through Katelyn's mind as she recalled her previous boyfriend tickling her intently on one occasion. Her worst moments had been when he had gently stroked his fingers along the hollows of her underarms, and when he would gently knead his fingertips into her sides and ribs. Like her little sister, Katelyn's absolute worst had been when her boyfriend scratched his fingernails along the bottoms of her bare feet.

Another realization hit the girls hard. Their parents were gone for the weekend, and the girls didn't have any plans for the weekend. It was Friday, and their parents had left at 10:00 this morning. Katelyn figured it couldn't be any later than 11:30 or noon at the very latest. Her heart sank. Their parents weren't expected to be home until late Sunday evening. Their captors had at least a full 2 days to tickle the sisters' all they wanted before their parents came home. Vanessa nearly panicked when she realized this.

"I don't know anything!" Vanessa blurted out. "Please don't tickle me!"

"Not that! Anything but that!" Katelyn was squirming in her seat, trying to find some weakness in the ropes. "Please, no tickling!"

The two intruders smiled at each other. The girls were already begging, and the torture hadn't even started yet. They expected their work to be done shortly.

"Bernard, I'll let you take the first session. I'm going to see if there's anything to eat in the kitchen." Victoria strode out into the kitchen,

"Well ladies, it looks like it's just you and me for now." His evil smile broadened. "Well, us...and my feather." The girls suddenly sat very still in their seats, neither of them wanting to draw the man's attention to themselves. "First thing's first, I suppose." He mused. Walking over to Katelyn, he gently grabbed the the toes of her socks between his index fingers and thumbs, and slowly peeled them off of her feet.

Katelyn cringed and tried to pull her feet away from the man's hands, but it was no use. The ropes held her ankles firmly in place. She cursed herself silently for wearing ankle socks today. "Oh no, please. Not that." Katelyn begged. "My feet are too ticklish. I'll go crazy."

"Is that so?" Bernard chuckled. "Well then I guess you'll have to start remembering things a little more clearly, for the sake of your ticklish feet."

Katelyn's toes curled as she felt her socks slide over her arches. She gasped as he suddenly jerked her socks the rest of the way off of her feet. He took a moment to look at her soles, admiring how pretty they were, and how cute her toes looked when they were curled.

"Your turn." Bernard said, looking over at Vanessa. The younger sister squeaked in surprise. She struggled as her socks, too, were removed. Slowly at first, but then abruptly yanked off at the end. Surprisingly, she never begged to keep her socks. Katelyn thought it may have been because she was too scared to.

Bernard spent a few moments admiring Vanessa's bare feet, before taking a step back and looking from one sister to the other. Finally, he wafted his feather in the air before them. "Alright, girls. Who wants to go first?"
113131321211211.title: We're spies.

1131313212112111.content:
by Ishimura42

The girls remained silent, their eyes wide with fear and their hearts filled with dread. They each silently hoped they wouldn't be tickled first, knowing and cursing that in doing so they were dooming the other sister to ticklish torment. The silence seemed to stretch on forever, though it was only a minute or two, before Bernard spoke up again.

"No volunteers?" He asked, his voice feigning surprise. "Well then," An evil smile crossed his face, "I guess I'll just have to start with the little one." And with that, he took two steps and sat cross-legged on the floor, his face parallel with Vanessa's tiny bare feet.

Vanessa's eyes widened further when she realized she was going first, and she immediately started thrashing against the ropes holding her in place. "Oh no, please!" She begged, her voice frantic. "Please don't tickle me!"

"Then tell me where the vault is hidden." Bernard demanded. He couldn't contain his smile. Vanessa's toes were curled in defense, and her soles wrinkled. He could tell already that she was very ticklish, and expected to have some fun with this interrogation.

"I--I don't know!" Vanessa's voice seemed on the edge of tears. "Please, I don't know anything about a vault! Don't tickle me!"

"Oh, I'll tickle you." Bernard's voice a hint of a playful threat. "And I won't stop until you tell me where the vault is." With that, he raised the feather up and began lightly tracing its sharp tip up and down Vanessa's right sole.

"Eep!" Vanessa squeaked in surprise when she felt the feather on her foot. For a moment, a very brief moment, she locked her jaw and bit her lip, hoping to hold her laughter in. Her right foot twitched and jerked as she felt the feather's tip slowly caress her sole, traveling from her heel to the ball of her foot and back down to her heel. It was only a matter of seconds, however, before Vanessa's lips gradually widened from a smirk, to a smile, to a grin. Her eyes were watering from the strain of holding her laughter in.

It only took ten seconds of this light tickling for Vanessa to break into a fit of uncontrolled giggles.

"...heh...hehehe...ehehehehehehehehahahahahahahahahahahaha! Oh nohohohohohohohohohohoho! Ple--hehehehehehehehe--plehehehehehehehease stohahahahahahap!"

"Are you ready to talk?" Bernard asked playfully, gradually increasing the speed at which his feather traveled over poor Vanessa's foot.

"B..buhahahahahahahat I don't knohohohohohohohow ahahahahahahanything! I swehehehehehear!"

"Then I guess I'll have to keep tickling until you do know something." The feather's tip began to swirl in tiny circles, teasing the sole of Vanessa's foot as it continued to travel from heel to ball.

"Hehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehe!" The poor girl was beside herself with giggling. She couldn't find the space between her forced giggles to even beg for relief. A wide smile crossed her face, and her eyes were squinted from the effort of laughing so much. She didn't think it could get much worse than this, but Bernard was only beginning the torture.

He began lightly sliding the feather back and forth along the undersides of Vanessa's toes. "EEP!" Her toes curled on reflex, blocking the feather out. "No--hehehe--not there...hahahaha...." She gasped through her forced laughter. To her horror, Bernard used his free hand to peel her toes apart, uncurling them, and resumed stroking the feather back and forth along the undersides. "Noooohohohohohohoho! Hahahahahahahahahahaha! Plehehehehehehehehease! Hahahahahahahahahahahahahaha!" Vanessa's giggles had erupted into full belly laughter. Bernard was sure she would have reached that point anyways, just by slowly teasing her sole, but he was curious and wanted to see exactly where this girl was most vulnerable. He continued to torment the girl's toes for several minutes, delighted at the way she shrieked with laughter whenever he probed the tip between her toes.

Much to Vanessa's horror, it only got worse when the feather found her instep. All semblance of thought left her mind as she felt the feather lightly scratch up and down the length of her arch. "AAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! PLE--HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA--I--HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! 4; Vanessa couldn't even beg coherently anymore. Her mind was given over completely to the sensation on her foot, and the attempts to beg relief were nothing more than instinctive. It was the most ticklish thing she had ever felt. Her memory of the ball-point pen paled in comparison.

Finally, after what felt to Vanessa as eternity, Bernard stopped. He gave her a couple of minutes to catch her breath.

"Are you ready to tell me where the vault is?" He asked playfully.

Vanessa could only sit and pant as she tried to regain her breath.

"Is that a no? Well then, I guess we'll just have to..."
1131313212112111.title: Vanessa gets tickled first

choices: The female continues more harsh forms of torture on Summer
She begins to torture Mouse, and force Summer to watch.
113132.content:
The two sisters awake tied to cold metal boards, in skin tight latex catsuits, blindfolded and gagged.

They were both very confused until they heard two pairs of feet begin to walk towards them. The two people (one male, one female) began to speak.

The male one said "Hello girls, do you know why we've brought you here?.. oh right, you're gagged."

Muffled grunting could be heard from the girls.

Then the female one spoke "you beautiful girls are here because you have some information we want. And we're gunna get it. We are going to torture you until you beg for death. Hows that sound?"

Muffled frightened yelling was then heard from underneath the gags.

Summer began to feel a small tickling sensation in her latex covered armpits. She gave a small giggle but quickly regained control of herself. Until the tickling intensified and she completely lost it.after what felt like hours (in reality 5 minutes), the tickling stopped. She then began to feel her shoes being taken off. Once both shoes were off, a very pungent oder of BO spread across the room, as summer hadn't taken her shoes off in about a week. Her face turned red, and she tried to hide her embarrassment. She then felt her small pink socks being removed as well. The person with her socks then ungagged her, stuffed the socks in her mouth, and regagged her.

The female interrogator called over her partner, and said "you get her armpits, i'll take her feet." They both agreed and began tickling.

Summer was struggling to free herself from the bonds that kept her in place, to no avail. But she did begin to sweat profusely.

The male interrogator said he didn't think the tickling was torturous enough for her, so suggested taking off her catsuit.

The female agreed, and began to cut away at the catsuit, revealing only a semi-transparent bra, and her panties.

The woman then looked at her male partner, and told him to leave. He followed orders, and quickly ran out of the room. She then began to lick the sweat from Summers armpits, which was the worst tickling so far for Summer.

After she was satisfied with the torture, she ungagged Summer and asked if she wanted to relinquish any information.

Summer defiantly yelled "NO, ILL NEVER TALK!!"

The female interrogator chuckled, and calmly said "ok".
113132.title: In an interrogation room in a foreign country

choices: The sisters plan ticklish revenge on each other
Mouse decides to play a trick on Summer
12.content:
"Calm yourself, sister. We're not going to do anything dangerous or extraordinary.
We're just going to stay at home, like mom said, and have a normal day."

"Spoilsport" Mouse pouted, but did not oppose her older sister. She ran into the living room and throw herself onto the couch with a defeated sigh.

Summer walked in the kitchen and began to prepare dinner for the two of them while Mouse was channel-surfing on the TV.

But when is a teenage detective's life easy? They barely had the chance to enjoy having free house for forty minutes when something unexpected happened...
12.title: Stay at home and relax

121.content:
"Mom? We did not expect you so early."
Summer's mother entered, in her large coat and hat, putting down her large handbag and looking a bit tired.

"I'm afraid my meeting with the Hollering Heights Housewives has been cancelled. There was no reason to make a two-hour trip to town if I can't get anything done."
She kissed the girls, hugged them, then retired to her room to remove her make-up.

The Salt sisters looked each other. A weekend with mom, huh. Just the three of them.

A naive onlooker would have easily been deceived by the previous charming family scene.
But the truth is, as the three women went their separate ways in their minds they were all plotting like crazy, assessing the new situation and preparing for the coming storm.

Make no mistake, the Salt family loved each other.
But when someone is as smart as Summer, as beautiful as Stephanie and as energetic as Mouse, everyday life easily escalates into a constant battle for dominance. They were all playful and devious in their own ways.
Normally it would not be a problem when Dad was around, since his presence forced them to put on their best behaviors, and they could never really bare their fangs.
But now it was only the three of them, and that meant that sooner or later something would set them off.
And when that happened, someone would get tickled. :p
121.title: Mom arrives home early

1213.content:
"Summer! Come up here!" Mom's voice rang from upstairs.
Summer's heart jumped.
Oh shit, did she accidentally go into my room and find all my secret private detective stuff? Did I remember to lock the door?

But she found her mom was in her own room and sitting on her bed.
"Come here for a minute. I wish to speak to you seriously."

Oh no. One of mom's famous heart-to hearts.
Summer approached cautiously.

"Come here and lie down on the bed."

Summer sat down next to her on the bed.

"No, I mean lie down horizontally."

Summer jumped up.
"I'm not just going to..."

"Better get this over with now, honey. Mouse? Help me."

A confused Summer was gently grabbed by four hands and forced onto the bed. Mom then pulled out some silk ropes and tied them around daughter's ankles, while Mouse (whom Summer was trying to shoo off in vain) tied them around her wrists.
Mouse then disappeared under the bed with the end of the rope and emerged at the footboard, where Mom pulled the two ends of the rope and tied them together.

To Summer's horror, she was now bound with her arms over her head and her legs stretched, her feet resting on the footboard.

Mom then sat down next to Summer's feet and began to massage them.

"Mom! What are you doing?"

"It's okay, honey, just relax..."

For Summer, her feet were a private zone.
Even though nothing bad was being done to them, there was no way she could relax while somebody was touching them.

She saw Mouse from the corner of her eye and suddenly a blindfold was pulled over her eyes.
Now, she was bound AND blinded.

"Mom, what is this about?"

"Hmm? Why'd I need a reason to spend time with my daughter?"

"This isn't normal!"

"Oh, it's just a bit of fun."

Summer did not like where this was going and gritted her teeth.

"You never call me up here unless you think I did something bad. You think you have some dirt on me, and you're trying to make me admit it! I just know it!"

"Whatever gave you THAT idea?" her mom said, letting go of the peds and started playing with her toes instead.

Summer giggled.

"Mom, you're tickling me!"

"Am I?" she asked absent-mindedly.

"Please, I can't tell you what you want me to tell you if you don't tell me what it is! This is all unnecessary!"

"Well, since you insist..."
Her mom paused, drumming her fingers on Summer's soles.
"Your father and I have been worried about your grades, honey. It seems as if your mind hasn't been on your studies lately."

Oh...I guess that was true. Summer was always a diligent student, but recently she's been too enamored with her detective reference guidebooks to really pay attention to what's been going on at school.
She's also gotten in a couple fights with teachers over disagreements about theoretical subjects, and because they had caught her sneaking around school, or getting into fights with misbehaving kids.

She had no idea her mother would take them all this seriously, but it seemed like she expected her to apologize So she did.
But mother just went:
"Oh honey, you know we'd never love you based on just your grades. We have no business forcing you to care about what you don't want to, or to tell us what has been distracting you from them lately.
...Mouse, take the other foot."

"I'm sorry..." Summer said weakly and scrunched her soles, as if THAT helped.

"Woo-hooo huhuhehahahoo"

Her butt danced around under her, but it did not help the ticklish feeling coming from her feet at all.

Summer had heard of people being called "passive-aggressive"; he understood it meant that they paid back others for stuff they did while they pretended that it did not bother them.

But this was otherwordly. She's going to make me piss my pants just so to make me tell her what she thinks she knows!

"I've been collecting old articles..." There was no way she would admit her hobby to her just like that, but it was being forced out of her in smaller bits. "And old rocks and glasses, too!" Her mom just went "That's interesting, honey."
She had long, pedicured nails that dug cruelly into Summer's soles.

This is attempted murder, she thought My own mother is going to murder me. Famous kid detective killed by mom, that's what the newspaper is going to say...Please. Please not my soles!

"Not my soles, Mom."

"Oh yes your soles dear. Your ticklish little soles."

Summer's mind raced. What else could she possibly tell her? There was nothing that she would've wanted.

"I...Kinda have a crush on Daniel from class B! Please don't tickle me any more!"

"Ssh, hush. That's good to know. But c'mon dear, you hurt me.
You think I'd pry on my daughters' private relationships?...Mouse, bring the brushes."

"He asked me out yesterday!"
Summer gabbled, soles flapping about trying to hide.
"He game me cinema tickets for Friday!"

She could feel the brushes hover over her soles.
"Please, mom, I promise! I will be the best daughter ever!"

To her amazement, the brushes actually drew back.

"I'm not mad at you honey, I'm really not. But you should confide in us a little more."

And was tickling the soft soles of Summe with her fingetrips.

"Mom, that's too soft! Stop!" Summer screamed, feeling close to fainting from the maddeningly gentle torture.

Summer's mind was in panic, she didn't know whether she was being let go or just being kept in a false sense of security.

But her mom seemed to be finished.

"Ooh, my ribs. Ooh, I have a killer headache." Summer sighed.

"It was so good to have this little talk, honey. You know if you have a problem you can always come to me and I will listen. I'll come back to untie you in a little while."

Summer said nothing, she was too exhausted.
She just lay here for about five minutes.

Then she...
1213.title: Unusual punishment (tickle by mom)

12131.content:
When she felt fingers on her feet that were both smaller and less pointy than her mother's, Summer felt annoyed and angry.
"Mouse I know you're there! Stop this right this minute!"

"Hee hee. But Summer, we didn't even finish our game yet.
So tell me, what tickled more, the fingers or the brushes?"

"Neither! Untie me!"
She could not hold back the gurgling noises building up in her throat.
Mouse, oh god, wasn't just exploring with her tiny fingers (which wasn't so bad) but actually started scrubbing
her with one of the damn hairbrushes that she was spared from just now not very long ago!

Summer fell back on the bed and attempted to bury herself into the soft cushions.

What a family, she thought...Tickler mom and her tickler daughter.

"MOUSE, THIS IS NOT A GAME!" she cried. "IT REALLY TICKLES!"

"But I really want to hear about you and Dan Mitchels, too. How about I stop after you've told me all about you and him?"

Whether Mouse made Summer spill her secrets by the top of the hour or not, this was one memorable humiliation and defeat for Summer Salt. She consoled herself with the feelings of certainty that history won't record it - after all, who'd believe the image of the world famous detective being tickled to death by her own sister?
Noo, stop, it's too ticklish!
12131.title: Felt fingers on her feet (Mouse's fun)

122.content:

         Summer heard her father say something to Mouse, and then her Dad entered the kitchen with lilâ sis in tow at his pant-leg. âHey hon!â, he said, giving Summer a quick smooch on her forehead while grasping her shoulders affectionately, yet looking at her seriously, âThereâs been a slight change of plans. Iâm still going out of town, but Iâm going to need you two to pack a suitcase each for a little staycation at a motel with Mom. Okay?â

         Summer could tell that something wasnât quite on the up-&-up with Dad, but she didnât want HIM to know that just yet. Perhaps there was a way she could help him with whatever obviously had him looking kind of edgy.

         âBut I just made pancakes!, Dad!â, Summer countered, âCanât we eat first and then go?â

         Her Dad was in an obvious rush to get back to their parentâs bedroom for something heâd apparently forgotten to bring with him on his trip, but he consented, âThatâs fine, honey. You two go ahead and eat up those pancakes and have one for me. Iâd join you, but I have to catch this plane.â

         Dad was already almost back up the hall from the master bedroom as he continued, âNow, Iâve arranged for an Ebus driver to come pick you up for the motel, and they should be here within an hour, so eat those pancakes quickly and get out of those pjâs girls. Tick-Tock! Timeâs a-wastinâ! I want you to be ready when he gets here, got it?â

         âMmokay, Dadnmm! num-num!â agreed the girls as tried to reply with their mouths full of delicious pancakes, gobbling them down as fast as they could, which earns the two loving tousling of their hair by their Dad as his keys clink in the door, âNow girls, I know your Mom and I say this to you all the time, but seriously â donât let anybody you donât know in here until your ride comes. Deal?â

         âDeal, Daddy!â, the girls smile and wave as he departs, but even little Mouse senses that things are out of sorts with Dad.

         The girls look at each other quizzically, then decide to finish their breakfast before hurriedly getting prepared for their move to some motel for apparently several days with their Mom. It didnât make sense! Why not just stay here at home as usual, and have Aunt Denise look in on them from time to time?

         âNo adventure, huh Dad?â, Summer mumbled to herself while trying to think through what could possibly be going on.

         âHuh?â, asked little Mouse, âDid you say something, Summer?â, she looked up at her sister, obviously worried by events some herself.

         âOh! Nothing. Umm, just go get ready. Donât pack too much. Donât forget your toiletries, your phone, maybe a swimsuit in case thereâs a pool at the motelâ, Summer dwindled off, still trying to reason out what was happening, âIâm going to clean the kitchen up then join you in our bedrooms to pack.â

         And the girls hustled to it, changing right out of their pajamas and into their regular ware. Summer made sure she packed as much of her sleuthing gear as she could in amongst her everyday things. She had a hunch she just might be needing them!

The Salt sisters were still in their bedrooms getting packed to go to the motel with their Mom when -
122.title: Daddy's Alright?

choices: "Alright, I'll show you. But promise me you'll stay quiet about it."
"Sorry girls, there is no time for this, you'll learn all about it later."
"I can't, but I'll give you a hint. See if you can figure it out on your own."
1222.content:
The girl's mother arrived home at the same time the girls were coming down from upstairs with their bags, just as the ride their dad called pulled up in front of the house.
She clearly had to leave in a hurry, because her usually flawless make-up now looked less than perfect.

"What happened, dear?... I only got a call saying to come home as fast as possible! Are the girls alright?"
"It's wonderful, honey! Amazing! This is the most important discovery in my entire career!"

The girls looked at each other and hurried up so that they don't miss anything.
"What is amazing?" Mouse asked curiously, emerging from under the table by her dad's feet.
"Ah! Nothing, nothing. You girls follow your mother and be good now, you hear?"
"C'mon dad, why do you always need to keep everything a secret from us?" Summer complained. "We're gonna grow up to be distrustful and boring like this like Mrs. Hobbs."
"Yeah why can't you just show us?"

Their father pondered for a second then said...
1222.title: Driver & mother arrives

choices: An unfamiliar woman comes inquiring about something
Ack! They are attacked by thieves!
125.title: The noise at the door

choices: The HH Museum of Culture and History!
13.content:
Mouse hesitated. "Mom won't be happy if she finds out that we went out without supervision."

Summer brushed off the comment.
"She doesn't have to know about it! Mouse, listen, this is the first chance in months that I can go out and do what I do best.
The town's getting overrun with criminals and unsolved problems just because Summer Salt, Teen Detective had to stay in and study all summer!
Look, if you want we can go and see mom first and ask for permission.Or leave a note and be back before they notice."

"Okay" Mouse gave in. "But if we're late, I'm telling that it was your idea!"

"No problemo." Summer smiled widely. "I have a good feeling about this.
My dear Mouse, my instincts are telling me that adventure is waiting for us at..."
13.title: Head out to town

choices: Accept the money and go shopping
Insist on staying and helping her
Insist that Mom should come with them too
131.content:
Merry Mill shopping mall is where the girls' mother works from Monday to Saturday. With some friends she runs a small store as a part of her online jewellery business.
She is surprised to see the girls running around on their own and scolds them for it, but (as Summer anticipated) in the end she decides that it is safer for them to stay near her than to head back home on their own.
Since she still has some unfinished work to complete, she gives them a few dollars to use on whatever they want in the mall.

Summer and Mouse then...
131.title: Merry Mill shopping centre!

choices: Summer drops Mouse off at the daycare center
1311.content: Since the girls have lucked out, they must now decide if they should split the money and each should go her own way, or if they should stick together while walking around the mall.
1311.title: Accept the money and go shopping

13113.content:
Merry Mill ran a drop-in child service area as a special service for customers, a safe room with toys and snacks where parents could leave their child while they were busy shopping. This is where Summer and Mouse were now headed - though Mouse understandably objects to the idea...

"I'm not a baby!" she sulked, feeling insulted. "Mom knows I can look after myself! If she lets you off on your own then why do I have to be stuck in some stupid playground?"
"Yeah we KNOW you can Mouse, but mom thought maybe it'd be safer and you'd enjoy it more too if..."
"Mom has the stupidest ideas. I'm going with you. That's final."

At this point they reached the entrance, where a middle-aged lady was waiting for them with a broad smile.

"Oh, you must be little Mouse. Oh, my, look at you" she said, pointing at her flip-flops. "you have the cutest little toes! I'm so envious!"

Mouse eyed her suspiciously.
"Piss off lady. I haven't agreed to any of this."
"Eh heh heh..."Summer interrupted. "She can be a little foul-mouthed, but I'm sure she's going to like it here..."
"Oh, absolutely!" the daycare staff lady went. "We've got everything here: board games, hoops and jump ropes, books, music..."
"Hmpf." Mouse was unimpressed.
"We also - I'm only telling you this secret - have some special toys only for the best little children in the back room..."
She bent down and whispered something into Mouse's ear.
Mouse's eyes opened wide.
"You know what Summer? I think this is a good idea after all. You can go and I will stay here."

"Okay suddenly, I'm not so sure about this." Summer said.
"Mouse, what's gotten into you?"

"What? I just think this lady is very nice."
She hugged the older woman's leg and flashed her best shit-eating grin at Summer.

"Ookay...Maybe I should come in with you just to check on everything..."

Mouse wrinkled her face.
"What, you wanted to leave me here and now you don't want to? I told you I'd be fine."

"Well if you says so." Summer said. "If anything happens, just call mom or I'll be back in an hour or two OK?"

"Yeah yeah sure. No need to rush."

Summer gave them one more weirded-out glance, shook her head in disbelief and ran.

The older lady patted Mouse on the shoulder.

"So, would you rather see the toys in the back now or...?"

"Yup."

They walked to the back room where Mouse jumped for joy. It must've been used as a storage room because it contained all sorts of large plastic parts, presumably from jungle gyms, toy castles or the like. But the most interesting item was in the back where two of those plastic parts had been attached to a stretcher, forming crude foot stocks.
While the two plastic slabs were too weak to be able to seriously restrain anybody especially an adult, they could probably trap a child for a while before they could free themselves.
Mouse squeaked and ran up to it. She slipped out of her flip-flops and quickly climbed on board, slipped her feet into the device and and stretched out on the padded mattress.

"There's noone else coming for the next hour so we can have plenty of fun, whatever you like." the lady said sweetly. Mouse's plump little feet looked adorable, she just wanted to caress and fondle them.

Mouse was pleased with herself. A whole hour of tickling and neither mom nor Summer can complain or interrupt her.
She lay back and stretched her soles, ready for the wonderful feelings to come.

Where should the story go now?
13113.title: Summer drops Mouse off at the daycare center

131132.content: Summer walked around absent-mindedly, checking out out the displays and shop windows. It looked like she had an hour to spend and some money in her pocket so what should she use them for?...
131132.title: Follow Summer's choices...

choices: A card on the floor - somebody must've dropped it.
A note inside the book, hidden between two pages.
A book sticking out on the shelf, as if it was recently moved.
133.content:
The public library was an ancient building in the city center. Historical, majestic, and, Mouse thought, duuull.

"Only you'd do something like this." Mouse whined. "Only you'd want to spend a Saturday afternoon in a LIBRARY."

"Mouse! This is a treasure trove! What are you saying!" Summer shouted, her eyes gleaming. "As my sister, surely even you must've inherited at least a smidgen of my detective instinct! For the keen eye, this place is a blah blah blah" Mouse stopped paying attention at this point.
She followed Summer without any resistance as they walked past the reception desk and her sister started checking out the books on the nearest shelf.

"Ah yes, this is just what I was lookfEEHEHAHAHAA!"

Summer jumped when she felt something squee her sides, and spun around to see a giggling Mouse run off.

Some of the other guests and the stout lady behind the reception desk were giving her dirty looks.
"Be silent in the library, please." she said.

"Oh...yes, I'm really sorry!" Summer apologized.
"(Mouse!)" she hissed. "(Get back here right now!)"

It was then that she noticed...
133.title: The Hollering Heights Public Library!

choices: Jamie and Chris come to visit
A house party maybe? Every classmate comes over?
14.content:
The girls had two very good friends they had known for years. Their names were Chris and Jamie, both kids around Summer's age. They attended the same school as the girls. Summer knew for a fact that they'd love to be invited to hang out around this time.

Chris is the more timid one of the two and often ends up being the tickle target or lordered around; secretly fantasises about getting the others back and wants to prove that he/she can be just as brave and strong as the rest. Summer's closest friend.
Jamie is the stronger and more confident of the pair, a popular person who has a soft spot for Mouse.

(Chris and Jamie's genders are decided by the chapter writer)

Mouse also had a couple of good friends in her own class.

Or perhaps they might get other visitors today?
14.title: Call some friends

141.content:
Jamie arrived first, and with the usual casual straightforwardness slipped out of those trademark boots and headed on to Summer's room.

Chris lagged behind shyly, as usual. The four friends hugged and soon started conversing about what they should do for the day.
141.title: Jame and Chris arrive

choices: Why not just tickle one of us?
1411.content:
"How about we hold a tickle tournament?" Jamie suggested innocently.

The others stared. "What'd that be like?"

"I'll explain. We form pairs and do tickle-fights. The winners gets to tie up and tickle the losers for the rest of the day."
1411.title: Jamie suggests a tickle fight

14111.content:
The rules were soon agreed on. Four cards with the participants' names would be thrown in a bag; the first two names drawn would be the first fighting pair, the remaining two the second.
Tickle-fights would happen on the mat in the living room. It was forbidden to move outside the ring, marked on the floor with crayon, or to use any other means of attack except tickles. Wrestling moves, for restraint and such, were okay though.

"What about Mouse?" Chris asked. "She's smaller and weaker than any of us. She'll be at a disadvantage."
"Hmm, true." Jamie said. "Whoever fights Mouse will have to accept being tied on their ankles and wrists. Is that fair?"
The others nodded indicating that it was.

The four friends lined up next to the mat, ready for their first big official tournament...

By the way, what was Chris' and Jamie's gender again?...
14111.title: Sure, let's do it

choices: Summer vs Mouse, Jamie vs Chris
Summer vs Jamie, Mouse vs Chris
Summer vs Chris, Jamie vs Mouse
141111.content:
They chose Chris as the referee for the drawing.
"Okay" she announced. "The first name is..."

How do the pairs end up?
141111.title: Girl

choices: Oh shit, I was wrong - I'm the one at a disadvantage here!
She ended up on top of Mouse
One of her bonds came undone
1411111.content:
"Alright! It's a sister battle! And me, I'll be pairing up with my ol' friend Chris here." Jamie said putting an arm around Chris' shoulders.

"Summer you remember the rules right? You have to accept these bonds first."
They tied Summer's wrists and ankles together with a piece of rope.

Summer looked funny as she hopped away and took her place opposite to Mouse on the mat.
Jamie and Chris were watching them with interest.
Summer was feeling confident. Even if her limbs were tied, she had to be much heavier than Mouse, there was no way she could lose if it came down to physical strength.

Jamie yelled "BEGIN!" and Summer hopped forward and Mouse charged ahead. They bumped into each other and both sisters fell onto the mat.

Summer soon discovered that...
1411111.title: Summer vs Mouse, Jamie vs Chris

choices: Chris fell on the floor laughing
14111111.content:
Summer soon realized her miscalculation. While the ties seriously hindered her movements, Mouse could just dart around without abandon. Now that Summer was kneeling too, the height difference didn't matter anymore and she could easily get behind her where she couldn't reach her. Her sister was pinching her sides in turns, something that Summer always hated.

She doubled over trying to protect her belly and realized that this had been Mouse's plan. With strength that she thought impossible from her, the little sister forced her arms under her where she could not bring them out because of the rope around her wrists, and was now sitting on her back.

"Let's see those bare feet" Mouse sang, pulling off her sister's stockings. She was holding down one ankle with one hand and scratched with all five fingers with the other.
"NOOOUUUH!"
"Submit" Mouse commanded. "Or I'm not gonna stop this."
"I can't I can't- I'm sorry..."
Summer panted. She did not want to be tied up and tickled all night, but the feeling on her soles was un-fucking-bearableee!

"Summer, just count your losses, this way you're only getting yourself more torture" Jamie laughed.
"Okay fine I give uuuuup!" Summer yelled.
Mouse finally let up and Summer sat up on the mat panting.

"Oh shit, what did I get myself into." Summer said and laughed.

"Don't worry. Little Chrissy here will be joinging you in a minute." Jamie assured her.

The two friends took the sisters' places on the mat, while Summer laid back on the couch still panting, and Mouse hugged her.

As soon as the match started, Chris ran ahead and attacked Jamie's legs, squatting down so that she wouldn't reach her.
"Oh, you plan to fight back?" Jamie said, amused.
"Well sadly, for you, you're still a thousand years too early..."
She grabbed her tiny partner with a bear hug. She easily forced her arm behind her back and sat down comfortably on the mat where she'd soon tickle-torture her tinier partner into submission.
Catching Jamie by surprise, however, Chris was still fighting and managed a sneak attack...
14111111.title: Oh shit I was wrong, I'm the one at a disadvantage

choices: Summer and Chris argue wit Jamie about chaning their clothes.
They change their clothes without protest.
141111111.content:
Jamie thought she had won the war, and was going to get to tie up Chrissy and Summer, but she was mistaken. Chris suddenly lept up, and pinned Jamie's arms above her head. Jamie, now realized that she was the one who was truly disadvantaged, was staring unflinchingly at Chris, awaiting an attack. Chris began to taunt Jamie by slowly running her fingers up and down Jamie's inner forearm, and upper arm. She began to slightly giggle, and Chris asked her if she wanted to give up before it got too bad. Jamie, thinking she could easily escape, said no, and then Chris began to really tickle her.

"NOOOAHOHOHHHAAAA STAHHHPPLEEASSE!!!!" erupted from Jamie as Chris began to viciously tickle her armpits (her most ticklish spot)

"I GIVE UP!!!!!! I GIVE UP!!!!!!" PLEASSSSEEEE!!!" Yelled Chris, inbetween hysterical laughter.

"Ok, that settles it, Summer, and Chris, prepare for the torture of your lives." Said Jamie.

She says she came prepared, and told the two losers to go to Mouse's room and put on the clothes that were in plastic bags on the bed.
141111111.title: Chris tickled Jamie's underarms

choices: Somehow manage to hold it in (Jamie makes a mistake)
Hold it in...and pay for it
141111113.content:
Chris attempted a boob grab but it lacked power and Jamie would force her friend onto the mat without effort. There, she began Jamie's infamous side & underarm tease. Stretching out one arm with one hand, she scribbled on the underarms non-stop, while whispering taunts into her opponent's ear.
Mouse and Summer were sweating in embarassment, seeing that the victor was clearly decided.

But to all of their surprise, Chris stayed on.
Jamie didn't know where she got it from, but she had a strong determination not to lose. Of course, seeing that she could not possibly turn the match around from this position, all that pluck was just wasted.

She tried her neck, her thighs, getting again more giggles, but no admission of defeat
Annoyed with this stubbornness, Jamie forewarned her friend.
"Chris! Give up! Don't make me tickle your soles!"

Chris put both palms on her mouth and said nothing.

"Okay" Jamie sighed. "remember, you asked for this."
She freed Chris' feet from her elegant slippers. She was looking at a pair of wiggling bare feet, obviously pampered and taken good care of. Ridiculous that the owner of a pair of such pretty foot would just sacrifice them for the sake of a tickle-match.

Jamie laughed.
"C'mon Chrissie, you're not a fighter - there's still a chance to save these delicate little feet! Just say yes!"
Even though she said, secretly she hoped she'd say no - no...she probably wouldn't be able to stop even if she said yes.
Such creamy white soles, and a rare chance to tickle her friend out of her mind pretty much with her consent?
It's not like Jamie didn't jump her from time to time, but Chris was always so shy and reserved towards her, this was a rare opportunity.

"Okaaay, here I go..."

"MMMMMMH!" Chris screamed into her hands trying to hold it in.
She shook, she squirmed, wriggled like a worm, but did not yield even though Jamie's fingers were teasing the heck out of her sensitive pretty feet.
Mouse and Summer felt both sorry and awed for her.

After ten minutes, Chris looked seriously tired, though she still didn't give up.
"Jamie...Come on...That's enough...I can't...anymore..."
"You did not cry out your defeat yet. We can't stop until you admit you have lost, remember?"

Desperate about her loss but even more desperate about spending another minute under those fingers, Chris would...
141111113.title: Chris fell on the floor laughing

choices: They put Mouse's idea in practice instead
1411111132.content:
"Still struggling? Okay, your funeral..." Jamie said. She adjusted her position and grabbed Chris' legs keeping her in a hogtie-like position. She stood up to drag Chris back to where she was since she managed to wriggle away a couple of feet since they started.
Mouse yelped in surprise.
Jamie looked at them. "What?"

"You moved outside the ring." Summer gasped. "That's a penalty."
"What? No I didn'-oh damn."

"Did we agree on a penalty Summer?" Mouse asked.
"Hmm...How about ankles and wrists tied like we did before. That should give her enough of a disadvantage to count as punishment."
"Nah, that's boring! Why don't we give her ten...no, twenty minutes of tickle-torture?"

Jamie looked a bit worried but when she looked at Chris an saw her panting, red and half-crying her confidence came back.

Pff. Even if she had to take a penalty, how much of a threat can she be?
1411111132.title: Somehow managed to hold it (Jamie makes a mistake)

choices: Tied her spread eagle to the bed
14111111323.content:
"Mouse, what a great idea."

Jamie began to look worried, because even though she liked to be tickled, she didn't know if she could handle it coming from three people at the same time.

Summer and Mouse looked at Jamie, and thought she was going to try to run away, so they immedialtely pounced on her. They shoved some cloth in her mouth and
14111111323.title: They put Mouse's idea in practice instead

choices: "Well we didn't actually say she couldn't remove them..."
"Sorry Summer, you broke the rules, that means a penalty."
"Let's just stop the match until we tie her again."
14111113.content:
As the two sisters struggled to untangle themselves, Mouse somehow managed to grab onto Summer's torso with her whole body, and she was now tickling her neck between her chin and her breasts. Summer laughed and tried to shake off the little parasite. When Summer finally managed to get to her feet Mouse let go and rolled to her feet, then ran behind Summer and started to pull her feet out from under her. Summer, with her feet bound, struggled to keep her balance. "Stopit!" She yelled at her sister. Mouse didn't listen, and she now was playing with her socks pulling them off knowing her sister wouldn't be able to stop her as long as she was standing. As soon as Summer felt one sock slip off and reveal her defenseless bare foot to the cold air, she saw this too and reconsidered her strategy. She dropped on her back and kicked Mouse away with both legs. Mouse rolled and screamed when she realized she almost went past the line that marked the end of the ring...and here came Summer, rolling towards her and trying to push her out.
"Summer!" Jamie shouted. "You know you're not allowed to win that way!"
Summer grumbled and tried to grab the little sister, but she was on her back again and touching her hard to reach sensitive places from behind. She shuddered when she felt her teasing the side of her neck.
"Aahh! You little-gulp, I mean, not the armpits!"
However, as Mouse was dancing around the doubled over Summer, she felt the rope around her wrists slip and her hands came free. She grabbed the little pest and put "the claw" on her stomach.
"Finally! Now you're doomed, little brat!"
"Ahh! Cheating! Cheating!" Mouse shouted.

Chris looked at Jamie. "Should we stop them?"
14111113.title: Round 1 (one of her bonds came undone)

choices: Jamie starts with a karate kick
Jamie starts with a wrestling hug
Chris folds into a turtle position to protect her belly and feet
141111131.content:
"Well it's not like we said she wasn't allowed to remove them once the match started..."
"YES! Now, it's over!"
"AAAH! AAAH!"

Summer expertly tied the rope that previously forced her hands together around her sis' two hands and feet, then she held her up with one hand by the end of the rope while she tickled both of Mouse's soles at once with the other.

After 2 minutes of Summer asking "Are you sorry? Are you sorry?" Mouse threw the match.
Mouse probably knew she could not win against a freed Summer because she gave up surprisingly fast and without much resistance.

"Alright baby, it's our turn." Jamie said. Chris followed her onto the mat.

The opponents started with circling around each other at first without either of them making the first move, then...
141111131.title: "Well we didn't actually say that she couldn't..."

1411112.content:
"Aw, how lucky, Chris, to get the easy opponent."
"Easy opponent?" Summer said. "I'm actually feeling sorry for her. A tiny girl like her half-tied up like that sacrificed to Mouse's fingers, it's gonna be a massacre."
"Hmm...It's certainly gonna be interesting, a fight between the little ones. And don't forget who your opponent is, eh, Summer?"

Summer nodded and gulped. Luck had thrown her against the Evil Queen, with her physical strength and tickling experience Jamie would probably be the toughest opponent. But Summer wasn't planning on giving up just yet.
When you thought about it, among the four of them wasn't she the one who had the highest chance to win against Jamie?
Her childhood friend thought she's got this in the bag? Summer would show her a few surprises!

With that, the tournament began...
1411112.title: Summer vs Jamie, Mouse vs Chris

choices: Jamie and Chris pitted against each other
141112.content:
Two girls and two boys, this looks like it could be fun.
Everyone was waiting eagerly for the result of the draw which came out as..
141112.title: Boy

14112.title: "Why not just tickle one of us?"

141122.content:
"Mouse, are you really okay with that?"
"Yeah, it sounds like a fun game."
141122.title: Mouse

1411221.content:
Summer watched in horror and disbelief as her best friend expertly tied her little sister to the bed.
She was feeling conflicted and unsure if she should stop her, but she was amused by looking at Mouse's predicament.
The little girl has clearly gotten a nose itch since Jamie went to work, but wasn't able to scratch it with both arms tied above her head, causing her to grimace which Summer found quite hilarious. She had to cover her mouth to hide that she was laughing.

Mouse's pair of feet had gotten tied together and placed over the footbard. Her arms were lifted above her head and tied to the headboard.
Jamie reached up and tested the ropes.
"Are they holding you firmly?"
"Yes. Grr."
Jamie then went to prepare the tools she was planning to use.
At times like this, her sadistic side sometimes emerged.
Although it was only fair that she should not be too hard on her honorary little sister, she also rather enjoyed having a prisoner at her mercy. Well aware that she wouldn't be able to hold herself back once she has started, she had to decide which approach to follow now.
1411221.title: Tie her to the bed

choices: Let's go on with the feet.
Maybe her face and neck first.
14112211.content:
Since her last encounter with Mouse, Jamie learned that it was pointless to tickle the little one fast and hard - Summer's sister would laugh her head off, but otherwise she quite enjoyed herself.

So to be truly evil she'd need to try a different approach. Jamie prepared all the things she would need to the foot of the bed, mostly feathers and soft brushes, but she was not going to use them yet. She began teasing the younger sister with short, gentle strokes.
She was barely touching the skin, only long enough that the sensation would register.

After about 30 seconds, Mouse started fidgeting and was visibly uncomfortable.
"C'mon Jamie" she complained. "When are you going to tickle me?"
"But I AM tickling you." Jamie laughed. Mouse groaned, and buried herself deeper into the mattress.

"You have such a cute voice."
Mouse blushed, but her face started to look scared. But it'd be a while before she'd break, just as Jamie liked it.
14112211.title: Drive her wild

14112212.content:
Jamie started the game by softly running her ten fingers on Mouse's two soles at the same time. She did not bother giving her much foreplay as she knew the little tickle maniac would love it anyway. She sat on the bed and loosened the ropes a bit to be able to take her pair of feet in her lap.
The underside of her soles felt warm and soft, and she quite enjoyed drumming her fingertips alongside them in classic tickle-y fashion.

Mouse loved it, too. She tensed her soles and stretched out her toes out without being asked to and wiggled them around invitingly, signalling that she was enjoying the attention. It'd be a while until Jamie had her fill with her soles. Light scratches on the balls, arches, arches and under the toes earned her some determined giggles. Mouse was taking regular breaths and grinned confidently.
She kicked when Jamie dragged a feather along the side of her feet, just to test her.
Jamie then picked up a pen and she drew a flower on the left foot, then switched to a different type of pen and wrote "Mouse's foot" on the other

"Ehihihihi. Ihihihihi. Hehehee."

Jamie then looked around for other toys she could test on her tiny victim...
14112212.title: Tickle her nicely (fingers and pens)

choices: "...you're such a good friend and sister?"
1411231.content:
"What? No."
Summer looked at them with a puzzled expression.
"Out of the question. You know me, why are you even asking me this?"

Mouse and Jamie hunched their heads between their shoulders, a bit disheartened by Summer's flat-out response.

"Aw, not even just a little..."

"Jamie, are you crazy? You know how much I hate being tickled.
What possible reason would I have to agree to something like this?"

"Um..."

"Well" Mouse volunteered. "Maybe because..."
1411231.title: "Summer should be the one tickled."

choices: "I promise it won't happen this time!"
"OK, you got me. But wouldn't you want to do it regardless?"
14112313.content:
Summer shuddered. "Who'd have fun getting tickled? Mouse, I'm surprised YOU can stand it as much as you do."

"Oh, it's no big deal." Mouse said, scratching the carpet with her toes. "I enjoy it."

"Don't you wish you could learn to see the fun side of it like your sister?"
Jamie asked, striking the iron while it’s hot.
Summer sighed.
"Nice try, but it wouldn't work. Mouse and I are too different people."

"What if...What if we only gave you small baby tickles? That wouldn't be so bad, would it?"

"Yeah, right. Once I'm tied up you'll just play with me as you want regardless of how much I beg and cry."

"Summer, you don't trust me?" Jamie gasped.
"NO, I DON'T TRUST YOU, YOU..YOU..." They both ended up laughing and hugging.
"I still don't trust you tho." Summer whispered.

1421.content:
Halfway up the staircase Mouse turned around and yelled. "Dad said you have to watch us. But feel free to leave and break the house rules." Before Summer could make a proper response her sister rushed up the stairs following her two friends into her room. The door shut with a bang. Miss Salt followed her sister for a few steps up the staircase, changed her mind and went back to her newspaper left at the breakfast table. Her junior detective occupation required a more thoughtful response. Had she charged into the room occupied by two hyperactive girls - the quiet one did not count here -, she would rather be ridiculed when the door closed again. Mouse should have told her that she had invited friends on this Saturday morning. It was an unusually early time in the day for kids to come over. Looking at her newspaper without reading further she pondered, that the time was too early unless Mouse was up to something.

After cleaning up the breakfast table, leaving Mouse's used dishes on it, she went into the living room and started one of her favorite movies with the volume turned up. When it started she removed her socks and traipsed up the stairs slowly, leaving out the ones that would creak when you stepped on them. The voices of the movie were booming even on the first floor, rendering any pure listening operation at the door to her sister's room impossible. Summer entered the room next to Mouse's room, which housed the household items like the ironing board and hoover. After locking the door she removed the items from the cupboard and squeezed herself into the narrow space. She opened a small wooden frame in the back wall of the cupboard and reached through the large hole in the wall and leaned forward. It had taken six precious days for her to cut that hole in the wall. Mouse had cherished the mirror she received as present from her sister, not looking at it close enough to see that it was a two way mirror. Now Summer had a prime peeking spot into her sister's room. A small microphone with headphones provided sound.
