152.content:
Summer and Mouse were sat at the computer in Summer's room.

Summer was checking her detective email to see if any cases had come forward while looking on the internet for cases, while Mouse sat there board.

"Well, did you find any cases?" asked Mouse.

"Not yet, but I'm gonna keep looking" said Summer.

Just then, the phone rang.

Summer picked it up, this was a private number for people to call with cases so it had to be for her.

"Hello, Salt Detective Co" said Summer

"Hi there, Is this Summer and Mouse salt?" asked a boy's voice.

"This is Summer Salt, who's speaking please?" asked Summer.

"This is Nathan Ericson, you don't know me but I've read about you" said the boy.

"Do you have a case for me?" asked Summer.

"No, I have one for US" said Nathan.

"Come again?" questioned Summer.

"Oh right, I should have mentioned this sooner but me and my little brother, Vincent, are also junior detectives. We have this case where an abandoned pediatric psych ward was apparently shut down a few years back after being found out for not having any actual patents, but taking kids and doing experiments on them that involved laughter in some way. As you can probably guess, the whole mess was covered up. We were going to investigate this further, but decided to get some help from detectives with a little more experience than us. We realized you were local from the flyers and posters you put up to advertise your detective agency, so we contacted you" said Nathan.

"So...you want to work together?" asked Summer.

"Yes, it would be an honor to work with such great minds as yourself and your sister. So, are you in?" asked Nathan.

"Hold on a second, I'll have to talk it over with Mouse" said Summer.

"So, what do you think Mouse? This boy's also a junior detective and he wants us to work on a case with him, you up for it?" asked Summer to her little sister.

"Sure, I'll go grab my gear" said Mouse as she went off to find her detective kit.

"Alright, where should we meet?" asked Summer.

"How about the hospital itself? It's called St Giggles Psychiatric, you can search for it and it should come up" said Nathan.

Summer typed in a name and found an address.

"Alright, got an address. See you there in about 1 hour" said Summer.

"Sounds good" said Nathan.

The two detectives put the phone down and Summer went to grab Mouse.

"C'mon mouse, we're going to St Giggles" called Summer into Mouse's room.

"Hang on, just grabbing my UV Light and a liquid collection thingies in case of blood" said Mouse.

"I highly doubt there's gonna be blood, it's not exactly a murder scene" said Summer.

"Yeah, but you never know" said Mouse as she came out with the liquid collection tools.

"Alright, Miss CSI. You all set now?" asked Summer.

"Yeah, got everything I need" said Mouse.

"Me too" said Summer as she grabbed her kit and headed down stairs.

"How do we get there?" asked Mouse.

"Our wooden go-karts. they can fit two people in at once, so it's perfect if we all need to move from place to place" said Summer.

"Alright, let's do this" said Mouse as she headed for the back yard where the go-karts were.

1 Hour later, Summer and Mouse turn up to St Giggles, where Nathan and Vincent were already waiting.

"Hey, I'm Nathan and this is Vincent, I believe we spoke on the phone" said the tallest boy.

"Indeed we did. I'm Summer, nice to meet you" said Summer as she shook Nathan's hand.

"So, we're looking for evidence of the experiments. We should stick together in case this place isn't entirely abandoned" said Vincent.

"Yeah, good Idea" said Mouse.

"OK Guys, we are entering our crime scene" said Summer as she and Nathan led the way.

As they entered the building, they realized it was very dark.

"Everyone got a flash light?" asked Summer.

"Got mine" said Mouse as she turned it on

"Me too" said Nathan as he activated his.

"Mine's right here" said Vincent as he turned it on.

"Alright then, where should we check first?" asked Nathan.

Mouse piped up with a suggestion, she thinks they should check
152.title: Summer finds an abandoned hospital to explore

choices: Vincent finds a match for the prints on the door and the computer, suspect found
Mouse removes the marker from the documents and finds Chris on the subjects list
Summer and Nathan get the computer working. It's windows XP, and kind of slow
1521.content:
"Maybe we should check the nurse station, it might have records or documents with names of subjects or former staff" said Mouse.

"Good thinking, it might also contain other evidence such as a schedule listing the different experiments" said Summer.

"Alright guys, first we need to glove up" said Vincent as he applied a pair of latex gloves.

"Why, it's a nurse station. There's nothing dangerous in there to touch" said Nathan.

Yeah, but we might contaminate the crime scene for ourselves, or even other detectives" said Vincent.

"Actually, it's not a bad idea. there may still be traces of liquid medication in there" said Summer as she and Mouse also gloved up.

"I guess" said Nathan as he borrowed a pair of gloves from Vincent.

"Alright, let's head on in" said Summer.

The four detectives entered the nurse station and saw papers and stationary everywhere.

"Whoever last worked this station sure wasn't organized, just look at this mess" said Vincent.

"or MAYBE...they left in a hurry" said Nathan.

"Yeah, they sure weren't sticking around to clean THIS mess up" said Mouse.

the four detectives scouted for clues, not missing the smallest detail.

"Hm, these documents have all the names blacked out with permanent maker, no luck there" said Nathan as he looked through a bunch of documents.

"Actually, you might be surprised. Pass them to me, I'll see if I can find out what's underneath the marker when we're processing all the evidence" said Mouse.

"Wait, you can DO THAT?" asked Nathan.

"Well sure, if it's an original and not a photocopy" said Mouse.

Nathan shrugged and let placed the documents in a plastic bag that Mouse was holding.

Mouse wrote "Documents - St Giggles" on the label.

"Documents bagged and tagged, what's next" said Mouse.

Hey guys. Be careful, cause it looks like the ceiling tiles are coming down, but come check this out" said Summer from the back room.

"Guess we should have worn hard hats" said Vincent as he walked through slowly, so as not to shake anything.

"Hey Summer, what did you find?" asked Vincent.

"A computer, this was probably where most of the paperwork was done. it looks like it may be a little old, but I could probably get this working again and preserve the files on the hard drive while I'm at it" said Summer.

"Don't move anything yet, I gotta dust this thing for prints" said Vincent as he bought out a powder and brush.

"Why? You can't do anything with those even if you manage to get them, you need special software" said Summer.

"I have some. It can only find people who've been in the criminal system in the last 5 years or on the medical board for the last 10, but it's still quite handy" said Vincent as he applied some powder to the brush and started brushing the keyboard lightly.

"How the HECK does he even have that?" thought Summer in amazement.

"Hey Summer, I found a liquid" said Mouse.

"A liquid? In the nurse station?" asked Summer.

"Yep, collecting it with the Integriswab now" said Mouse.

Summer was confused, what liquid could possibly still be here after years of this place being abandoned?

Just then, she spotted a vile was tipped over and some liquid had poured out.

"I think I just found your liquid Mouse, but I'm not to sure what this liquid IS" said Summer.

"Great, bag and tag it so we can compare the samples using my laptop and kit later" said Mouse.

"Wait, you bought your laptop with you? And more importantly, it can DO THAT?" asked Summer.

"Yeah, just in case we needed to compare samples of something, I have software on there that gives a rough comparison. Like, if you put Coke or Sprite on a swab and then put it in the analyzer, it'll come back as carbonated soda" said Mouse.

"Where are you and Vincent even GETTING this software?" asked Summer.

"There are a number of sites, I'll leave em by your computer when we get home" said Mouse.

"Cool, they're bound to help me as a junior detective" said Summer as she screwed the lid onto the vile and placed it into a plastic bag labeled "Unknown Liquid"

"Alright, all bagged and tagged" said Summer.

"The computer's all yours, Summer. I got a set of print to run through the system" said Vincent.

"How're you going to get that back to our crime lab? it's too big to put into your go-kart and something might break" said Nathan.

"You're right, I DON'T have space on my go-kart. But, what I DO have is a friend with a little mettle wagon who owes me a favor" said Summer as she pulled her cell phone out.

Summer went into the main hall of the hospital to make a call, but Nathan noticed something.

"Hey guys, this emergency exit door is open. And the bar's still pushed in" said Nathan.

"What does THAT mean?" asked Mouse.

"That someone was here before us, but left in a hurry when WE showed up. It also means if I can match a print from the door to someone, we have a suspect" said Vincent as he dusted the bar for prints.

"I got a partial, which won't mach up to ANYTHING unless we already have a full print" said Vincent as he used some adhesive lifting tape to take the print.

"Alright, calls been made. My friend is 10 minutes away" said Summer.

"We just found out that someone was JUST HERE" said Mouse.

"OH MY GOSH, ARE THEY STILL AROUND?" asked Summer.

"Not if these shoe prints are anything to go by, they lead OUT the door" said Vincent as he snapped a picture of the shoe print for later comparison.

"And they start near the puddle of liquid I found" said Mouse.

"Maybe the liquid was left by our run away suspect" said Nathan.

"We'll find out soon enough" said Summer.

10 minutes later, Summer receives a text.

It read "Hey Summer, I'm outside with the wagon"

"Alright. Mouse, grab the keyboard and mouse, Nathan, grab the monitor, Vincent, you get the wires while I grab the computer itself. Let's go" said Summer.

As the four detectives walked outside, they saw Chris standing next to a blue wagon.

"Chris? What are YOU doing here?" asked Mouse, surprised to see him.

"It's my wagon that Summer needed" said Chris.

"I wonder WHY she was owed a favor" muttered Mouse as she rolled her eyes.

"Let's put it this way, it's nothing like you think" said Summer.

"Really? Are you SURE you didn't give him a quick smooch but he wanted to keep it secret?" joked Mouse.

"I WISH" said Summer to Mouse, making both girls snicker.

"What are you doing here Summer, and is that an OLD COMPUTER?" asked Chris.

"We have a case about some experements that were carried out here before this place shut down, you think your wagon can hold this thing?" asked Summer.

"Yeah, it should" said Chris.

Chris looked at the hospital and looked really uneasy.

"Are you OK?" asked Summer.

"Huh...OH. Uh yeah, I'll be fine" said Chris.

"Please take it easy with Bessy, she's my favorite wagon" said Chris.

"You named your wagon Bessy" smirked Summer.

"Yeah, I know that's kind of dorky, so don't tell anyone, OK?" said Chris.

"Looks like you owe me another favor" smirked Summer.

"Alright, Vincent with me, Nathan with Summer. Let's roll" said Mouse.

once they got to Nathan and Vincent's place, they split into 2 groups.

Nathan and Summer were working with big evidence, such as the computer they had just carted and carried up the stairs, While Nathan and Mouse work with forensics, such as fingerprints, liquids, DNA and Documents.

They worked for 30 minutes before there was a break in the case...
1521.title: The nurse station, it may have a list of subjec...

choices: Mouse spills some liquid onto her skin that tickles like mad
The door closed and locked, trapping them inside the room
They realized the Dr that worked in this room was still inside (Tickle Torture)
1522.content:
"Maybe we should go in here" said Mouse as she stood by a big door with "Laughing Room" on in.

"That door DOES look suspect. Alright Mouse, we'll go into the laughing room...whatever a laughing room even is" said Mouse.

Nathan tried the door, but it was locked.

"Guys, maybe if we ALL push it might brake the door down" said Nathan.

"Wait guys, what if we..." said Mouse.

"No Mouse, we need to enter this room" said Summer as she, Vincent and Nathan started pushing on the door.

Mouse stood there, watching as they failed to open the door.

"Well, are you gonna help?" asked Vincent as everyone stopped pushing from exhaustion.

"Alright, step aside" said Mouse.

"What are YOU gonna do that THREE PEOPLE much bigger couldn't" asked Summer.

Mouse said nothing, but took out her hairpin.

She stuck the hairpin into the lock and started fiddling with it until eventually, the door opened.

Summer looked shocked but didn't say a word.

"Alright, I guess we're going in then" said Nathan.

As the four kids entered the laughing room, they found straight jackets on the floor, beds with wrist and ankle restraints, lots of feathers and brushes, an assortment of lotions and moisturizing creams and lots of sets of foot stocks.

"W...Wait, THIS IS TICKLE STUFF" cried Summer.

"Don't remind me" said Nathan.

"Huh? YOU hate getting tickled as well?" asked Summer.

"Yeah, me and Vincent are ALWAYS getting tickled by bad guys" said Nathan.

"OMG, so are me and Mouse" said Summer.

"Uh guys, can we PLEASE just grab what we need and leave. I REALLY don't wanna be tickled like we usually are" said Vincent.

"Yeah, our last adventure was WAY more than enough for me" said Mouse to Summer.

"I agree, lets just grab some photos, bag and tag any evidence and get outta here" said Nathan.

Just then, something really bad happened...

What happened?
1522.title: The big door that says "Laughing Room"

15222.content:
The light in the room dimmed. Summer whirled around. "THE DOOR!" The group was standing in the center of the room, holding photos and some tickle tool evidence in their hands. Aghast they saw the door slowly but steadily close, losing the fraction of a second in shock before they ran. The light was only shining through a narrow crease when they reached the door before a clanking sound replaced it by utter darkness.

An instant later four kids thundered against the large door. "OUCH. AHHHHHHH. NOOOOOO I AM SCARED" they shouted and collapsed onto each other. "Everyone ok?" Summer asked with a voice that was supposed to sound firm. "Where is your hairpin, Mouse?" She asked. "We need to open the door quickly before..." "I lost it, I lost it, oh no, does anyone have another one?" But nobody answered.

"We need light." Summer pondered. Did they have mobile phones (which did not have network access but at least a light)?
15222.title: The door closed and locked, trapping them insid...

choices: Locked in a straight jacket in seperate padded rooms
Locked in the foot stocks, barefoot and ready for treatment
Strapped to a bed, unable to move even a little
15223.content:
"Leaving so soon?" asked a voice in the darkness.

"W...Who said that?" asked Summer.

Just then, the group all turned to see a man in a doctors uniform stood in the door with four nurses next to him.

The man closed the door and locked it with a key.

"We can't allow you to leave now, you've seen too much" said the man.

"HELP, HEEEEEEEEEEELP" screamed Mouse, hoping someone on the outside could hear her.

"Oh, don't bother screaming little girl. I can promise you that nobody will hear you, the room is quite soundproof" said the man.

"Wh...Who are you?" asked Nathan.

"My name is Dr Giggleton, and I'm the Dr in charge of all the treatments in the laughing room. This hospital used to treat children for all sorts of things, and sometimes we'd use this room to treat, and even punish some of our patients" said the man.

"Treat them how?" asked Vincent.

"Why, isn't it obvious? Look around you" said the doctor.

"Wait, you TICKLED THEM" asked Summer, horrified.

"Yes indeed. In this particular room, we believe that laughter is the best medicine" chuckled the doctor.

"What are you going to do to us?" asked Mouse, not liking where this was going.

"Well, you wanted evidence of what went on in this room. I say we give you the best evidence of all, FIRST HAND EXPERIENCE" said the doctor.

"You mean your gonna...OH NO, NOOOOOONONONONONONONONONO" cried Summer.

"Oh yes. Nurses, prepare our little patients for their first dose of laughter therapy" said the doctor.

The group all ran in different directions, for a while evading the nurses. The nurses would come close, but not be able to grab them.

"Nurses, I give you full permeation to pin and sedate them" said the doctor.

The nurses each drew needles filled with a sedative that would knock the four children out once injected.

Each nurse pounced on a member of the group until all four were pinned on the ground.

"LET US GO, LET US GO" cried Nathan.

Next, the room was filled with "Ow" "My butt" and "That hurt".

Soon, the four children were asleep.

When they woke up, they were each...
15223.title: The Dr that worked in this room was still inside

152233.content:
Nathan stirred when he was trying to escape a wild screaming pack of nurses that were hunting him up a never ending flight of stairs. He raced and jumped but they were closing the gap on each floor but his legs felt heavy. Suddenly he reached a landing with a locked door. Pounding on it and rattling the knob did not help. He turned on the spot facing the nurses and froze in fright. But there was nobody behind him. Instead he opened his eyes and saw a white ceiling. His heart was pounding from the nightmare and he still did not dare to move. It was absolutely silent in the room. Carefully he tried to move his arm but he could not move it at all. It was the same with his legs. He managed to rise his heavy head and saw the predicament.

Three pairs of bare feet, the right foot ankle to ankle over a left foot, were wrapped tightly. The single foot of the two persons on the side was tied separately. He saw four pairs of bare legs disppearing under the same white long nightie that all four persons were wearing. He was on the edge, next to him was Summer, then Vincent and on the other edge the smallest feet would belong to Mouse. They were all tied tightly on an oversized bed with their arms stretched over the head and fixed with various straps. He realised that three hospital beds were used sideways, allowing four kids to be tied next to each other and the straps disappeared in the gaps between the beds.

There was nobody else in the room. "Hey, wake up. Summer. Vincent. We need to escape." He tried to rub his ankle which was trapped under the foot of Summer to wake her up.

- The kids woke up
- Visitors arrive
152233.title: Strapped to a bed, unable to move even a little

1522332.content:
"Kssst. Summer. HEY". Nathan hissed. The girl next to him groaned tired and tried to turn her body. He saw her flex her leg musles. "Wake up. Now." he urged. Instead he heard a door open somewhere in the large room and multiple footsteps announced the arrival of visitors. Nathan gritted his teeth. There was nowhere to go and nowhere to hide. He chose to face the horrible bunch and kept his eyes open. The doctor arrived with the same four nurses that had tackled and sedated the group earlier.

"Let us go you nerds." the boy hissed from his helpless position. "Hahaha that was a good one" chuckled the doctor. "He called you nerds." he repeated to the nurses who did not consider it to be that funny. "And I meant you as well." the boy added with anger, looking at the doctor. Dr. Giggleton was not amused at all. "How do you dare, boy. You don't know how to adress a doctor. You must treat me with honor. I have cured generations of cheerless kids and made them scream for joy." "psssst not so loud" Summer added, her eyes still closed. "switch off the tv" she added. "I give her a wake up call" one of the nurses added and took a stiff goose feather out of her pocket. Dr. Giggleton and the nurses watched with scientific interest and followed the tip of the feather with her eyes. Nathan became slightly nervous as the feather was approaching his right foot, but it's target was the bare sole of the older girl's left foot that was tied to the boy's ankle and rested on top of it.

The tip landed on the big toe, circled it and slowly trailed down to it*s base. "GHHHHHHN MHHHTTEEHEE MMMMMMHMHM MHHHH MH MH" Summer grunted and started turning her foot when drawing back did not work. Easily the feather followed and zig-zagged over the sole with it's tip. "GNNNHAAAAA WHHHHHN OGNNNNNNNH" Nathan had watched the feather move but was now lowering his head and tilted it to watch Summer's face. Her mouth was contorted by a twisted smile. She looked really cute, he thought. The feather turned at the heel, drew a circle around the ankle and started to go up again. The reaction became stronger. "MMHHHH HNNNNNNN UH UH UH TEHEHE" Summer groaned louder, her leg started to jerk. Nathan watched with interest as the girl's expression was growing both by agony and happyness. Dr. Giggleton waived another nurse to tease the other foot.

"MHHHHHH GNHHHHH MH MH MH FFFFFFN TEEHEHEHEHE GOOOOOOD GNNNNNNNNHHHH". "mhhhh what? where?" Vincent was being woken up by something which was tearing at his ankle. "What? Who are you? Wait Dr. Tinnitus and...." Dr. Giggleton fumed but a loud scream erupted from Summer. "IIIIIIIIIIIIIEEEEEEEEK IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIEEEEEEEEEEEEK". She was wide awake now, her eyes big and both legs still jerking from the treatment of both feathers.

- Wake up Mouse
- Tickle time
1522332.title: Visitors arrive

15223321.content:
"Now that you have rested it is time for the first experiment with you in the Laughing Room. And guess - it involves tickling hahahaha." Dr. Giggleton had found his dignity again and stood in front of four pairs of tied bare feet. "Nurses! Present the feathers!" The four nurses draw with a practised swing move their stiff goose feathers from their pockets and raised them high in the air.

"This is pathetic. And you, you are not a doctor, you should be treated in a lunatic asylum." Nathan was still angry but silently wanted to show off in front of the girls. Summer looked over as much as she could turn her head, briefly admiring him but chastened him for his lack of negotiation skills. "Ok Ok. What do you want from us Dr. Wigglington?" "HAHAHAHAHAHAHA Wigglington Summer his name is..." "SILENCE!" Dr. Giggleton roared while the nurses had a hard time not to laugh. "Giggleton, Dr. Giggleton, that is my name. You will remember it, if your mind is still sane after today. Now we....what?"

A cute sniffing came from the side of the oversized makeshift bed where the four kids were tied side by side. Mouse was still asleep but was wrinkling her nose. It was obviously itching but she could not move her arm to scratch her nose. "Why is she still sleeping? She has not heard what I said. I need more discipline in here." The nurses rushed over to the sleeping girl, the youngest of the four. One of the nurses whispered something and held her feather over the girl's face. Then she slowly lowered it between her eyes and drew it slowly over the short nose. "HOOOEEF" Mouse raised her upper lip showing her large front teeth. The feather took the same route again but ended squarely over the nostrils. "FFFFFIIEEEEF" the girl groaned and blew the air out of the nose, wrinkling it afterwards but getting no relief.

Another feather joined the game
- on her cheeks
- on her feet
15223321.title: Wake up Mouse

152233211.content:
"What are you doing to her? Stop it!" ordered Summer,nervous about her little sister which she could not see because Vincent's head was in between. But Dr. Giggleton held a finger to his closed lips and pulled a silver spiky pin wheel from his pocket. He indicated with the wheel to a pair of bare feet. Summer and both boys looked at the ghastly tool and shut their mouths. The sedating medicine was still in their blood limiting the level of activity.

Another nurse approached the still sleeping girl. Mouse was stirring although the feather had stopped to tease her small nose. Keeping their silence both nurses started to draw lines, triangles and circles over the girl's cheeks. "MMHH MMMMMMMMMMMHHHHH" the girl groaned when the feather touched a soft spot and tried to scratch herself. When moving her arms did not work at all she turned her head to the side to rub the cheek on the cushion. But the other feather took advantage of the fully exposed neck. "OOOOOOOOHHHH" Mouse exhaled in a funny way and tried to rub her neck but it did not touch anything, her eyes still closed. Suddenly a smile appeared on her mouth. A feather touched her cheek and caressed her lips. The girl smiled even more. One nurse carefully rose the cloth of the nightie and stuck her feather below towards the collarbone. "TEHEHEHEHE HEHEHEHEH" the whole girl shuddered. "Not there Peter. It tickles hehehe". "Interesting" the nurse grinned and gently pushed the feather further and drew it back, teasing the skin towards her shoulders and the beginning of the chest. "TEHEHEHHE PEEETER NOAHAHAHA". The other feather softly touched her now pouted lips. Mouse shuddered again, shouted "KISS ME!" and opened her eyes.

"WHAT?" yelled Summer. "Who is Peter? Do you kiss?" Vincent was looking at the little girl next to him with a different view. Did she have a boyfriend? Did they even kiss?

Dr. Giggleton decided to
- "clean" the feet with soap and brushes, done by the nurses
- test the pin wheel (himself)
152233211.title: cheeks

choices: The subjects were strapped to hospital beds, tickled without mercy for hours
The subjects were trapped in a room filled with laughing gas, driving them mad
The subjects were brainwashed or hypnotised into feeling non existent tickling
1523.content:
"Hey, what about that big door over there. The one that says "Video Tapes From Experiments" said Mouse.

"Well THAT seems oddly convenient" said Nathan.

"Watch out guys, sometimes "Convenient" can secretly mean "Dangerous" said Summer.

"And we have nothing to PROTECT us from that danger" said Vincent.

"Yeah we do. If someone attacks, use your torch to KO em" said Summer.

"Alright then, On Three Guys. One, Two, THREE" said Nathan before all the detectives gave the door a kick, sending it flying wide open.

"Summer and Nathan looked around the room and behind the door with the torches, but found no one.

"All clear" Nathan called, signaling that it was safe to enter.

The room had a bookshelf for videos, but it was empty.

"Darn, no evidence in here" said Mouse.

Summer looked down at the bottom of the shelf.

"Hm, try again Mouse. Try looking closer" said Summer.

Mouse crouched down and looked closer, and saw that there was something stuck behind the shelf.

"Good eye Summer, the shelf is tilting forward, meaning something's stuck behind it" said Mouse.

"Maybe it's evidence, or it could be trash" said Vincent.

Only one way to find out, let's move this shelf and see what it's hiding" said Summer.

All four detectives grabbed the shelf and pulled, but it wouldn't budge.

"Well, I guess we aren't getting THAT" said Nathan.

"I have an Idea. If you guys hold the shelf so it doesn't slam on our hands, Vincent and I can get our small hands back there and slide whatever it is up the wall and over the bookshelf" said Mouse.

"Hey, that might work" said Summer.

Nathan and Summer held the bookshelf tight, and Vincent and Mouse went ether side and started sliding the object up the wall.

"Ugh, hurry guys. This thing's heavy" said Summer.

"Almost, almost" said Mouse.

"C'mon guys, we can't hold it much longer" said Nathan.

"Nearly, steady, steady" said Vincent.

"Ooh. Guys, it about to fall" said Summer as her and Nathan's arms grew weak.

"Easy, easy...GOTCHA" cried Mouse as the Bookshelf fell back against the wall with a THUD just as their hands, and the object, were out of there.

"What is it?" asked Summer.

"A video tape" said Vincent.

"The staff that used to work here must not have been able to retrieve this, but we were" said Mouse.

"Hey, I have a VHS Player in my room. Whatever got recorded to that tape should still be watchable" said Nathan.

"You live far away?" asked Summer.

"Nope, just five minutes" said Nathan.

"Alright, let's roll" said Summer as all four detectives headed for the door they came in through.

Once they got outside, they had to adjust there eyes to daylight.

"Ooh, that's BRIGHT" said Vincent as he put a pair of shades on.

"Alright, Mouse, You ride with Vincent. I'll ride with Nathan" said Summer.

"Alright, let's watch that tape and see what kind of experiments they were" said Vincent as he took the back space of Mouse's go-kart.

"OK Summer, I'll give you the directions to my place" said Nathan.

Once they arrived at Nathan's house, they headed straight up the stairs to watch the tape.

Nathan put the tape in, but it needed rewinding.

Nathan hit the rewind and sat on his bed.

"Depending on the length of the tape, we could be here a while" said Vincent.

Once the tape was finally at the beginning, Nathan hit play.

The group were absolutely horrified to see...
1523.title: The door that said "Video Tapes From Expere...

choices: Shut the video off and start looking for Dr Featherstein
Keep watching (next subject is a girl who is tickled on her armpits
Keep watching (next subject is a boy being tickled by a hypnotized girl)
15231.content:
The screen showed a brunette boy strapped to a hospital bed with two nurses by his socked feet. He looked scared as he tried to escape the restraints.

"Oh please Dr Featherstein, I'm sorry for breaking the rules. Don't make me have the therapy, please" begged the boy.

"SILENCE, WE HAVE HEARD ENOUGH EXCUSES FROM ZE LIKES OF YOU" cried a German, gray haired man dressed in a doctor's coat. This was obviously Dr Featherstein.

"Zis is the first subject, Ricky. He has broken ze rules of the hospital, so he vill be subjected to over an hour of ze tickle stimulation therapy. Afterwards, we vill see if his behaviour has changed" said the doctor.

"The boy struggled harder upon hearing this.

"As soon as you are both ready, let zis trouble maker have it" said the doctor.

The nurses smiled and bought their nails up to the boy's wiggling feet.

"NOOOOOOOOO. PLEASE NOOOOOOOO. I'LL BE GOOD, I'LL BE GOOD, I'LL BE GOOOOOOOOD" cried the boy.

"Sorry, but it's too late for that" said the nurse on the left before she and her college started tickling his feet.

"AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA..............HAHAHAHAHAAAAAAAAAA. NO, NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOHOHOHOHOHOOOOOOOOOOOO. MY FEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEERHEHEHEHEHEEEEEEEET ARE TOO TICKLISH FOR THIS THERAPY" screamed the boy.

Everyone in the room felt sorry for the poor boy on the video.

"Alright, it's been two minutes. REMOVE ZEM" said the doctor.

"NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO" screamed the boy.

"Sorry, but these are confiscated until further notice" said the nurse on the right as she and her college grabbed the toes of the boy's socks.

"NOT BAREFOOT, NOT BAREFOOT, NOT BAREFOOT. NOOOOOOOOOOOOOO, YOU CAN'T. IT'S TOO CRUEL. AAAAAAAAAAAAAGH" the boy screamed as his socks were removed.

"Keep up ze dramatics und I'll have you looked in a straight jacket in a padded room while ze dogs lick your bare soles for hours" threatened the doctor.

"The subject is barefoot" said the nurse.

"Alright, continue ze therapy" said the doctor.

The nurses began tickling Ricky again, and being barefoot made it much worse for him.

"YAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA.........HAHAHAHAHAAAAAAAAAAAA. NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOHOHOHOHOHOOOOOOOOOOOOOO. STOP IT, STAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAAAAAAAAAAAAAAP IT" cried the boy.

Summer shuddered, that treatment looked horrible.

The kids decided to...
15231.title: The subjects were being tickled

choices: Watch the next video (Alison is forced to tickle Ricky's feet)
Try and track these patients down
Go back to the hospital to find evidence that any of this happened
152312.content:
The four children kept watching as the video faded out and then into another video.

There was a girl about the same age as Ricky in a hospital gown that is torn by the armpits.

She was tied spread eagle to the bed, and her armpits were stretched out.

"Zis little girly is named Alison. She tried to rescue Ricky, ze boy you saw in ze previous video, from his punishment. Now I will punish zem both by forcing ze boy to tickle ze girl's armpits" said Dr Featherstein as Ricky walked into shot.

"Please Dr Featherstein, Alison is truly sorry. I don't wanna tickle her armpits, she's my friend. I'll let the nurses all take turns tickling my bare feet till I pee, but leave Alison out of it" said Ricky.

info.brief_description: Two sisters get into tickling-themed mishaps. Prequel to "Mystery at Featherton Manor".
info.description:
Rather than a story with a strict focus, this interactive is intended as a collection of early Summer Salt adventures;
including (but not limited to):

Unfair Tickle Fair (the Salt Sisters' first big meeting with recurring antagonists Clown Prince and Pao-Ting)
The Case of the Cackling Attic (the Salts' old attic turns out to hold an unexpected treasure)
Salt Sisters in Double Trouble (two sisters tickle and get tickle-tortured in their own home)
The Omega Enigma (the sisters involve themselves in a real life spy drama after peeking at their fathers' papers)
Sign of the Seven (a surprise find reveals a clue to the town's secret)

Concept and characters were created by Kuddles:
http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1378124-Mystery-at-Featherton-Manor...

Feel free to create any additional characters and scenarios.
The starting four are:

Summer Salt: Your local neighborhood hobby detective. It's as if Nancy Drew had a tickling fixation.
Susan "Mouse" Salt: Summer's playful and curious younger sister.
Stephen Salt: A celebrated author of romantic thrillers, whose catchphrase is "adventure only happens in fiction".
Suzanne Salt: Loving mother of the girls and society lady. Runs her own small online jewellery business as a hobby.
info.pretty_title: Riddle of the Unfair Tickle Fair
